story:
Hayley Hills, 18 years old, is the youngest member of the Hills family. She has two loving parents in Rob and Marla, as well as older siblings Nick and Kenzie. Hayley has taken very ill the past few months, and last week Nationwide Children's Hospital admitted her into the Rheumatology wing for extensive testing. She looks to be diagnosed with an autoimmune disease, which will remain with her for the rest of her life. The initial treatment requires around 36 months of medication and restrictive diets. Thereafter, the disease hopefully goes into remission, provided she maintains a strict diet for the rest of her life. As a result of the severity of this illness, she will be in the hospital for at least the next couple of weeks, recieving testing and hopefully beginning treatment as soon as possible. Of course, the family will spare no expense in this process. With the life of a family member at stake, who wouldn't? Nevertheless, Rob and Marla will be facing enormous medical bills, between CT scans, overnight hospital stays, and day-to-day testing. This campaign directly addresses that issue. If we can raise 1,000 dollars, the path forward will be marked. If you would like to contribute, you can do so in the following manner:

Either:

  1. Donate directly to this campaign, outwardly or anonymously. Or,
  2. Tell your friends about the campaign, and perhaps they will be willing to contribute a small amount.

Even the smallest of amounts will make a large-scale difference in the lives of the Rob, Marla, and Hayley Hills. For the first time in their lives, Rob and Marla will get the recognition they deserve for all their hard work and perseverance. The entire Hills family is supporting Hayley with the local community behind her as well. Anything you can contribute will make a world of difference!

story: Our friend Randy Whitson was recently diagnosed with Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia  (ALL) which is a cancer of the bone marrow and blood. He is 43 years old and has a 5 year old son Max (who is will soon begin his first day of kingergarten) and beautiful wife Kate. He is currently undergoing aggressive chemotherapy treatments at Naples (FL) Community Hospital.  In addition to the emotional toll of this devestating news, the Whitson's are faced with skyrocketing out-of-pocket expenses based on their limited health insurance coverage.  As a friend of this beautiful young family, I ask your help with monetary donations in an effort to offset their financial worries so that they may focus on getting Max's daddy well again.  Please help us BEAT CANCER!

story:
Ego Creek is You!

= Your childhood at summer camp, distilled into a weekend, amplified to your matured tastes! = 

We'll meet at the beautiful Eagle Creek Overlook Campground, hugging the Columbia River at the Bonneville Dam.
Earn your Merit Badges by doing all the fun you possibly can!
Kayaking and fishing to the north, hiking to cliff dive at Punchbowl Falls to the south.
At camp, master your skills at archery, raving, laser tag, and knot tying! 

Through the night, we'll slumber in the cabin to the DRiPiest of ambient, downbeat, drone, IDM, and squirrel-bass. 
Come day, the music gets Psymply Psychedelic'er, and a rockin' dance party til the sun goes down! 

We will take the BootyBump in tow on the trails and over the bridges, finding adventure around every corner! 

Check the FB event page for the most up-to-date info, including possibly more info on what different perk levels will get you! 
(We have to publish this ASAP and editing is limited) 
http://www.facebook.com/events/411156905630282


We can't do it without you!
Every camper is a MEMBER of the clan and we hope everone has something to bring to the campfire.  

We need your commitment. 

AKA Funding, which will allow us to pay for:

  • permits
  • electrical needs
  • audio / visual needs
  • merit badge supplies
  • supplies for merrit badges
  • first aid
  • camp-style meals
  • OFFICIAL TSHIRTS! 

OKAY! LET'S EGO CAMPING!

We know not eveyone can contribute as much as they'd like. That's why we're using this tool.. 

  • check out the multiple tiers of contribution 
  • nobody will be turned away, but you must be on somebodys list
  • PLUR

Can't fund through the Interwebs? 

Try one of these options

  • Be a +1 for someone who is able to fund
  • Talk to jesiah or another egocreekian directly

story:
Nuvitrin is a patented oral diet spray that gives you natural feeling of fullness which leads to less food intakes, thus healthy and safe weight management. 

It was first researched and developed by a medical doctor, Yeonjung Ryu, who specialised in obesity and ran obesity clinic for more than 20 years. After having seen countless obese patients who suffer from physical and psychological side-effects of extreme diets, she decided to come up with a solution that is healthy and safe for anyone to use.

So she invented an innovative recipe, perfect for anyone who is weight conscious and wants to manage weight without having to consume any kinds of drug substances that may work against your body's natural mechanisms that forcefully suppress appetite. 

Along with other severe physical damages to your health, depression and nutrient deficiencies are very common side-effects of weight loss. But because Nuvitrin does not encourage you to consciously cut down on what you eat and how much you eat, you won't experience the same stress that you'd normally go through when you're trying to lose weight the traditional way which is the ultimate starting point for all kinds of physical and emotional side-effects.

Nuvitrin is made of FDA-approved ingredients such as olive extract, peppermint, guarana, honey and vitamins. These naturally-derived ingredients ensure that you are managing your weight in the healthiest way possible as it gives you feeling of fullness activated by the normal mechanisms of your body, not by those drug substances that are difficult to spell and to pronounce!

  • Simply spray 2~3 times orally 5 minutes before your meal time, 
  • Or whenever you have sweet tooth or craving for snacks!

When Nuvitrin is sprayed in your mouth, its ingredients will bind with your taste buds which will acknowledge your body that food is being consumed and so satiety signal will be activated. By the time you start eating your normal meals (5 minutes after 2~3 oral spritzes) your body will have developed sense of fullness which means you will naturally eat less than how much you normally eat without having to force yourself to put down the folk and knife, feeling stressed! 

Because digestive system is activated when Nuvitrin is sprayed orally and its ingredients bind with your taste buds, your body spends more energy running that mechanism than the amount of calories you consume, you will naturally burn more energy - thus weight loss!

We know very well that while the rate of obesity and the number of people who are weight conscious are rising rapidly, there are others who suffer from hunger and lack of foods. So we wanted to contribute in balancing this out by donating 1month worth food to children in need for every 3 bottles of Nuvitrin purchased through Korea Food for the Hungry International. 

Please go through our list of perks to see if you'd like any and if you want to join us on this good cause! :D

We also have Nuvitrin mobile app which is our diet news curation app! We upload summarised diet and exercise related news everyday for you. There is also an alarm function within the app that you can use to remind yourself to use Nuvitrin spray before your meal times. It is free for everyone and is available to download in Apple App Store and Google Play Store!

We want you to be healthy, especially when you are weight conscious. Instead of turning to quick-result solutions which may cause unforeseen side-effects, we want you to rather choose a healthier and more safe option that gives you a gradual but definite result - Nuvitrin. Throw away the drugs and believe in natural ingredients!

  • Production of Nuvitrin spray to meet orders from countries that took interest in our product (Korea, Japan, China, Thailand, Taiwan, and etc)
  • Marketing for both local and international exposure
  • Research & Development to make current product better and to further expand product line

  • Supporting Nuvitrin
  • Making food donations to hungry children with us
  • Telling friend about Nuvitrin and following us on SNS
  • Trying to be healthy 
  • Making the right choice of managing weight in a safe way
  • Spreading words about Nuvitrin using Indiegogo tools or any other SNS channels! 

Follow our Facebook page "Nuvitrin" for daily diet & exercise tips! and also follow our CEO's instagram "HIDDENCARDE" where she uploads daily diet tips (and you can have a peak into her everyday life!)

Contact us at any time if you have questions or are interested in working with us!

story:
Hi my name is Kristy Lockhart and my best friend was diagnosed with Lyme Disease in 2012 after being misdiagnosed for many years. It took her years and at least 100 doctors/hospital/specialist appointments and visits to finally receive a proper diagnosis.

In March 2014 Heather was 50% better in beating lyme, this has to do with her amazing lyme doctor & her extraordinary chiropractor and naturopath team & her own strength. Heather was on same antibiotics for 18 months, she got bit by ‘something’ weeks ago, ever since then she went from being 50% better to only 10% better with 80% of her previous lyme symptoms returning. She was bit by an unknown bug in late march which caused her ankle to turn red and swell double it’s size, insane itch, she wasn’t able to walk and I took her to the hospital emergency 3 times in one week to get no help, no referrals, nothing. For the last 6 months there was so much improvement, so much hope and light, and now, to be perfectly honesty, we are scared. Physically and neurologically it is as if Heather’s state is as it was before we even started lyme treatment back in September 2012. I have to help her wash her hair, I have to prepare all of her meals, do her laundry and dishes as her joints are swollen, painful and inflamed and she can’t do the things she normally did for the last 6 months as this new ‘infection’ is making all symptoms return that were seemingly gone. We have made an emergency appointment to go back to her lyme doctor only a month after seeing her, as everything we were doing (medication/supplement/etc wise) is no longer working. So far, in 2014 Heather has gotten shingles 3 times & is currently trying to recover from them again. Her immune system is compromised and this is the cause of them recurring.

Thank you to heather’s loving online family, on redbubble and face book, to her friends and even strangers that have donated in the past, shared this link, and supported her with love, kindness and patience and unconditional love during her journey. I couldn’t have helped heather go this far without all of you beautiful souls, and I don’t know what we would do without you. It’s a scary time, Heather likes to put on a brave face, but I myself am not only her best friend, but caregiver and have been watching her rapidly decline over the last few weeks. I need your help now more than ever.

If you know you were bitten by a tick and seek immediate treatment in Canada you go on antibiotics for a few weeks and you’re cured. If you didn’t know you were bit by a tick the tick not only infects you with a devastating bacteria, but it lays its eggs in your body which hatch in 18 days. Heather went almost 4 years in extreme physical pain, I watched her mind and body deteriorate in the most devastating way. Going to every medical appointment, ambulance ride, neurosurgeon, MRI, family dr visit and never getting an answer, having it all blamed on her ‘anxiety’ I decided to take matters into my own hands and researched full time, it was months of extensive research that all signs and symptoms pointed to lyme disease. In Canada treatment beyond a month is NOT available. Chronic lyme is not treated in Canada, and the few doctors who have done so, have lost their license. This is why we have to travel to the USA every 3 months for treatment and expensive antibiotics which are not covered.

The majority of people with Lyme disease are misdiagnosed for years and by the time it is discovered it is almost too late

In 2009 Heather had a gym membership, walked 5 miles a day, hiked, spent time in nature, and constantly doing photo shoots. Now, she can't walk more than 20 minutes, becomes so fatigued far too quickly, has difficulty breathing, chest pains, migraines, her joints swell up so bad she can't write or type, difficulty folding laundry, doing dishes and playing with her cat. Something in her body is malfunctioning as her entire body is covered in edema.

This woman means everything to me. I can't put into words how I love her. She is an amazing artist/photographer (www.locustgirl.comwww.redbubble.com/people/locustgirl) and a genuine pure soul and there's nothing I won't do for her. Meeting someone like this only happens once in a lifetime, and I fear her lifetime will be over soon if her medical treatment is unable to continue.

Donating to this campaign will ensure proper medical care and treatment and lodging while undergoing this care. It doesn't matter if it's $1 or $1000 every little bit helps. Even if you have no $ to donate, please will you post this on various social networking tools to spread the word?

Even while ill, both she and I helped out with other fundraisers (Rideau Valley Wildlife Sanctuary) by donating hundreds of dollars worth of her art to be sold to help treat injured wildlife. She went to college to learn how to take care of the disabled, now she is disabled.

On a happier note, Heather got to spend time with her favorite wild snowy owl this year, snowy momma goddess and this owl was/is the reason why Heather continues to have hope/fight, as 3.5 yrs ago she had lyme and no one would help/diagnose her, and meeting this owl, watching this owl survive and brave the cold ALONE is what motivated Heather to change her life for the better, mentally and emotionally.

-if you look under the tab ‘gallery’ you will see photographs of this beautiful owl and many other wildlife photos that we are offering as a perk, our gift to you for donating.

Please check out her wildlife photography as they will make you fall even deeper in love with wildlife. Heather (when she is able to go out) has this deep soulful connection with animals and it clearly shows in her photography.

She left home at 15 and she has no blood relatives who can help her, and she hasn't worked for years due to being so ill. I am a single woman and the ONLY person who has been helping her for years, please can you help me help her?

Any questions or for a list of the prints you would like, please email me here lockhart_ottawa@hotmail.com

I promise you if you were to meet Heather you would love her almost as much as I do. I have never met another soul with such an enormous loving heart as hers. Please helps us

Love,

Kristy

WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Donating

Perks

$5 - a photograph of heather holding a thank you note with your name on it emailed to you

$15 - a handmade wildlife thank you card with a hand written note to you written by Heather snail mailed to your door.

$20 - a 1 minute audio/voice email of Heather thanking you and acknowledging gratitude for your help

$40 - 8x10 or 8x12 photograph, your choice from the ‘gallery’ tab or her website.

$50 - a personal thank you video made especially to you and a personal handmade card/written and snail mailed to your door.

$100 - 11x14 or 12x18 signed photographic print of your choice from Heather snail mailed to your door

$250 - Ten 8x10 photographic prints of your choice snail mailed to your door

$500 - if you’re in the Ottawa area, I am a gourmet chef, and would be pleased to your cater your event or an intimate meal in your home. (my labor is free, the cost of food would have to be covered by you)

$1000 - if you live in the Ottawa/montreal area, my dear friend has 20 yrs experience as a plumber/electrician, welder and he would work for you for a day doing whatever repairs/renovations you wish.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you can’t contribute financially, that’s okay we understand. Spreading the word via social networking sites helps tremendously.

Always check yourself and loved ones for ticks. They are the size of a poppy seed. Anytime after hiking, camping, out in nature, have your friend to a full body tick check, this could save your life.

MEDICAL BREAKDOWN

Monthly costs in Canada

- travel expenses to medical appointments, pain specialists, etc ( $200)

- vitmans, supplements, tinctures, probiotics of a specific nature ($500)

(none of this is covered, this is all out of pocket)

- chiropractic / naturopathic / acupuncture treatments ($1000)

Every 3 months trip to USA

- travel expenses ($100)

- doctors visit ($500)

- antibiotics ($1500 - $2500)

Tests that are needed that we cannot afford in the USA

- $1000 +

- travel expenses ($100)
- doctors visit ($500)
- antibiotics ($1500 - $2500)
Tests that are needed that we cannot afford in the USA
- $1000 +

story:
The human side of health care

Health care, maybe more than any other industry, is about people. Those who use our health care system, and those who work in it, have profound and powerful stories to tell. These stories need a platform.

Faces of Health Care is a photojournalism website that aims to tell the health care stories Canadians need to hear. It combines artful photos with people’s experiences in health care – the good, the bad and everything in between. New stories are posted weekly.

To visit the pilot site, click here. You’ll see what we’ve already accomplished with grassroots resources and hard work.

This is not a traditional health care project. That’s why we need to get creative to keep this project going and expand its reach. With your support, we can:

  • Broaden the diversity of our stories by travelling to rural and remote areas and to locales across Canada
  • Improve the website’s design and make it more interactive
  • Post a new story every week that will spark important conversations on how to improve health care


Why this matters

The better we understand people’s experiences with the health system, the more we can improve health care. Policy makers are often far removed from the realities of giving and receiving care, and might not know the human consequences – both good and bad – of their decisions. Patients who use the health care system can benefit from sharing their experiences. Those who provide care can learn a lot from patients’ perspectives and from fellow health worker’s experiences.

Everyone will interact with the health care system at some point in his or her life.  In TV medical dramas, we often see heroics and extremes of situations. But there are important and real stories that happen every day that are not being told or shared. These stories are at times raw and angry, but also grateful, compassionate, funny and sad. They provide a window into the human side of health care.


The Team

The team behind Faces of Health Care is the same one that created Healthy Debate, which has been providing analysis and commentary about the health care system for over four years, and has become an influential voice in health policy. We will bring the same dedication and innovative spirit to Faces of Health Care that have made Healthy Debate such a success.


Feedback

We've had an incredibly positive response to the pilot site.

We are encouraged by this feedback, and believe that with your support, we can bring even more stories to life. Together, we can change the health care system for the better.

What a wonderful way to humanize health care policy. It reminds us that people are at the core of our shared effort and values. -Harvey Thomson, board member, Cancer Care Ontario

These words are angry and grateful and compassionate and respectful and funny and sad. It's all the chaff and the grain of their experiences. I loved the inspiration behind their choices, and to hear how a patient dealing with a doctor, and vice versa has changed that person, their outlook, their tolerance and their understanding. Powerful. – A participant of Faces of Health Care

This is outstanding work. – Chris Simpson, president of the Canadian Medical Association

This project is exactly what is needed in Canada right now! Obviously health care funding in this country is lacking, and restructuring is needed in many places, as well as new facilities. But there are a ton of "little" things that could be improved even without significant added money that would make such a difference in the day to day lives of patients. There's obviously so much to address, and I love that these are the sorts of issues Faces of Health Care is actually dealing with. – Ariane Khachatourians, chronic illness advocate

Please help us get the word out and make some noise about this campaign and the Faces of Health Care pilot website. Get on social media and share this with your friends and colleagues. Thank you for your support!

story:
Do You Know Anyone With Alzheimer's

I do!  He was my father and friend, Mike Tymoszczuk and MemVu is dedicated to him and all those families that have cared for or are currently caring for a loved one experiencing a brain health condition that want to stay connected and engaged in a meaningful way. My father's mind was set free on April 18, 2012. 

Hi, my name is Bill Tymoszczuk and I am the founder of MemVu and was the live in caregiver for my father who had Alzheimer’s.  In helping to care for my father, I found one of the most meaningful forms of engaging both him and I was through photo sharing.  Whether it was in my Dad’s early stage or late stage Alzheimer’s, our conversations and visits centered on a picture. Based on this experience, I created www.MemVu.com with a goal to provide joy and meaningful engagement for all participants.

I started this Indiegogo campaign to provide the funds necessary to enhance our existing MemVu platform that would make it more intuitive and user friendly and to create supporting Apps that will help family members stay connected to their loved one in real time, no matter where they are located.  The upgraded version of our existing site and app development was based on initial feedback from caregivers, healthcare professionals and others.

Our population is aging and the need for supporting cognitive health and social and family connections will only be greater.   

At MemVu, we are passionate and enthusiastic to continue to develop  cognitively stimulating resources to provide joy and engagement to families and their loved ones whether they are at home or in a long term care facility.  Your contribution, big or small, has magnitude!

 

Today, an individual or healthcare organization (Home Care, Assisted Living, Nursing Homes, etc.) can register on MemVu, create an Activity Center for an individual, invite family members and friends in to the Activity Center and begin to upload and share photos.  Those personally uploaded photos can then be used as game pieces or activities with our game templates.  MemVu has a robust data capturing feature that can track activity time, a "brain health benefits index" to look at cognitive functions over time and a "family caregiving benefits index" to monitor what is important to families such as facial recognition (e.g. Does Dad still recognize me and/or his grandson?).  We are also focused on currency recognition and way finding.

Healthcare organizations and individuals can register for Free and use standard photo sets, such as famous USA landmarks, 1920 Athletes, etc., on our game templates.  For healthcare organizations standard photo sets are used as part of our "Group" game feature to facilitate engagement and socialization.

Our Scientific Advisory Board has a depth of experience dealing with brain health conditions and is led by Dr. T.J. McCallum from Case Western Reserve University (my alma mater).

We also have a great alliance partnership with T-Mobile to provide new Samsung Galaxy Tablets to qualified healthcare organizations.   This relationship will help MemVu provide these organizations with a complete solution to help engage their clients or residents whether they are at home or in a long term care facility. 

 

 

In the News


 

The vision behind MemVu is to help families stay connected and meaningfully engaged with an aging adult or a loved one with a brain health condition like Alzheimer's, Parkinson's, ALS, Huntington’s, Traumatic Brain Injury, Chemo Brain or other cognitively impairing conditions.  MemVu accomplishes this vision by creating a resource platform allowing families to upload and share photos and even use those photos as part of a personalized "activity center" to include brain stimulating games  and other activities such as journaling, music and art therapy.  The resource platform will allow the player, family member or caregiver to select from a vast array of games and activities that would be the most relevant and engaging to the player.  They can then use standard photos or personally uploaded photos to enhance the engagement of the activity and bring joy to all participants.  We will also create.

 

We have done a whole lot of heavy lifting to get to this point but we need to go further to make MemVu even better for families and caregivers to stay connected and engaged.  Here is how we will use your generous contributions when we hit our goal and exceed it:

 

Wow, how awesome would that be to reach our goal and even exceed it so we can really drive our mission to help others, even on a global scale.  We would use funds above this level to hire an Activity Director/Product Manager with experience in the Long Term Care Industry, add to our IT staff to develop really cool and engaging activities.  We will also begin development of cognitive assessment tools including "Mood Reporting".

There are no shortages of activities we can create, just contributions to make it happen.  Share our passion and make a contribution!  If you can't, that is OK ... you can still share this link with others and participate in our referral program.

  

There are two ways to get MemVu Licenses and other perks Free: through a donation or our recently launched referral program.

Donate MemVu License's to Others - What a Great Way to Help

Whether it is the single license or the 50 license perk, you have the option to donate those license's to any other individual caring for someone with a brain health condition or an organization that supports brain health.  So, what types of organizations can benefit from your donation:

  • Hospice, Home Healthcare and Companion Care Organizations
  • Nursing Homes and Rehabilitation Facilities
  • Nonprofit organizations whose benefactors may have a cognitive impairment condition such as Alzheimer's, Parkinson's, ALS, Chemo Brain, MCI, Traumatic Brain Injury, Autism, etc..
  • Assisted Living Facilities
  • Adult Day Care Centers
  • Retirement Communities
  • Senior Citizen Centers
  • Residential Care Homes
  • Hospitals
  • Geriatric Care Organizations
  • Church Groups that have an elder care outreach program
  • Universities, Colleges and other organizations involved in Brain Health research.

If you plan on donating your MemVu license(s), especially to a health care organization, have them email me personally with their contact information at bill@memvu.com and I will give them a personal demo of MemVu and list them on this campaign below.  In the subject line of the email, simply have them say "Indiegogo MemVu Demo Request".  So, after you contribute, just drop me an email and let us know which organization you want your license(s) to go to.  If you have no preference, I will distribute the licenses evenly between the organizations listed below.

Current Organizations Accepting MemVu Licenses

The Brain Emporium  Cleveland, Ohio 
Center for Applied Research in Dementia  Solon, Ohio 
HomeWell Senior Care - S.E. PA  King of Prussia, Pennsylvania
The Intergenerational Schools   Cleveland, Ohio
The  Freda Joy Cebrint Foundation  Solon, Ohio 

 

MemVu Referral Rewards Program

At MemVu, we want to support nonprofits, companies and individuals that are supporting brain health with some of our MemVu Perks for FREE! Take a few seconds to share our campaign with everyone and earn referral rewards for your organization, yourself or just to donate to another organization.  This is a great opportunity to get MemVu licenses Free through the power of the referral for organizations that otherwise may not be able to afford them or contribute to this campaign.

If someone pledges to our campaign as a result of your referral, we will total your dollar amount and apply 20% of it to any organization listed on our campaign page that desires MemVu licenses or other Perks. You can even choose the organization. If it is for yourself or another family member, just let us know at the end of this campaign, too.

Where and How Do I Share the MemVu Campaign Link

Indiegogo creates a unique URL for you and our campaign to share with others.  Any resulting contributions are tracked and reported back to us and you.  You must
however use the unique URL associated with our campaign.

1.  Register on Indiegogo, if you are not already;
2. Go to our campaign page at http://igg.me/at/memvu/x/7616359 
3. Below the Video you will see a number of “Share Links”.  Here you can click on any of the social media icons that will automatically insert your unique URL.  You can click on the email icon which creates a standard email through outlook which also includes your unique URL.  Lastly, you can click on the “Link” icon which will copy your unique URL to your clipboard for you to insert in any more personal emails, forums or any of your social media communities. 

 

Get more details on our web site at https://www.memvu.com/referral_program

Share the Love and Get Rewarded!

 

 

Facebook Thank You Graphic 

For all perks that mention a Facebook posting you will receive a BIG Personalized Thank You Graphic from "Vu" and the team posted on our Facebook page, unless you contribute anonymously.  Be sure to Like it or Tag it so you can help spread the message.  See sample below.

 

 

MemVu Brain Stress Ball

For your contribution, we will ship you one of our MemVu Brain Stress Balls.  USA shipping is Free.

Large 15 oz MemVu Coffee Mug - Engage Your Brain

For your contribution, we will ship you one of our MemVu Coffee Mugs.  USA shipping is Free.

MemVu "Engage Your Brain" T-Shirt

For your contribution, we will ship you one of our MemVu T-Shirts.  USA shipping is Free.

Thank You with an eBook Perk - About "A Different Visit"

This manual was made especially for family members of individuals with Alzheimer's disease and other diseases or injuries that affect memory. Included are ideas and instructions for 42 engaging and purposeful activities that will bring new enjoyment to family visits.  It will be delivered as an eBook i.e. the Electronic Edition (not compatible with Kindle devices).  It is an excellent compliment to what MemVu is doing on the digital side.

MemVu Subscription Licenses 

For all Perks offering MemVu License's, we will create a promo code to use when you register and create an Activity Center on MemVu to account for your contribution level.  MemVu is free to register and participate in any Activity Center.  The only time there is a charge is at the time when an Activity Center is created for a loved one, patient, client or resident and that charge is $14.95 per month which is discounted in our campaign perks.


Sponsorships - "Vu's Wall of Supporters"

We will create a dedicated page called "Vu's Wall of Supporters".  This page will list individuals and organizations that have contributed to the success of our campaign.  It will be linked at the bottom (footer) of every page including our home page.  The listings will be in the following order: Premium, Gold, Silver, Bronze and Photo Set Sponsors.  Following these listing, any individual or organization that has contributed $50 or more will be listed under "Vu's Engaged Supporters".  Listings will be listed by contribution level, then alphabetically by last name or organization name.  Anonymous contributors will obviously not be listed.

Photo Set Sponsorships

In addition to personally uploaded photos, MemVu gives users the opportunity to select standard photo sets by category such as 1920 Athletes or Famous USA Landmarks.  Your name or the name of you company will appear when your sponsored photo set is selected.  Your recognition appears when an individual registers with MemVu and creates or just participates in an Activity Center.  If a healthcare organization registers and does not want to create an Activity Center then your sponsorship is also displayed (See our campaign gallery on how it will be displayed).

Premium Sponsorships

Each activity is designed as a template to use either personally uploaded photos or standard photo sets.  As a Premium Sponsor, your name or the name of your organization will appear when your sponsored activity is selected.  Your recognition will appear when an individual registers with MemVu and creates or participates in an Activity Center.  If a healthcare organization registers and does not want to create any Activity Centers, then your sponsorship is also displayed. (See our campaign gallery on how it will be displayed.)  You will also get the top listing on "Vu's Wall of Supporters", the perks associated with the Gold Sponsorship and fifty (50) one year MemVu licenses.  You can use the licenses for your own use or donate them.

 

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ’s)

What happens after my one, two or five year MemVu license expires?
After the license expires, you will be prompted for a credit card to continue MemVu at a rate of only $14.95/month per license. 

What happens after my tablet and data plan expire?
If you wish to continue using the data plan and tablet, you will be required to have a minimum of five MemVu licenses which will be billed to a credit card monthly at $14.95 each.

Are there any restrictions with the “Tablet Perk”?
Yes, the data is restricted to 1MB per month and the tablets are locked down to only use MemVu unless you use a Wi-Fi connection.  You can however user other resident programs and features included with the tablet that do not require Internet/data usage.

What happens if my Tablet breaks?
If your tablet breaks or is lost or stolen, you can purchase a replacement tablet at $295 when the broken tablet is returned.  Any warranty repairs or defects will be covered through MemVu and T-Mobile, if need be. 

Can I get additional tablets and data without getting additional MemVu licenses?
Yes. The monthly fee is $29.95 per month for the tablet and 1MB data plan but the number of tablets cannot exceed the number of MemVu licenses you have.

Do I own the tablet outright?
If you choose to keep the service active for 24 months, the tablet is yours.  However, if after one year you decide not to continue for any reason, then you must return the tablet in working condition otherwise there is a $200 purchase price.

Can I use my Wi-Fi connection to get Internet access?
Yes. You can use any other internet connection to use MemVu or even download a video.  If you are on T-Mobile’s data network, you will be restricted to MemVu only since there is a 1GB limit every month. 

Does MemVu offer any Branding or Marketing Materials for my organization?

Yes organizations can actually brand an activity centers they pay for and we can customize collateral for you.  Visit the FAQ section on our web site for examples and details.

(See our campaign gallery on how it will be displayed.)  You will also get the top listing on "Vu's Wall of Supporters", the perks associated with the Gold Sponsorship and fifty (50) one year MemVu licenses.  You can use the licenses for your own use or donate them. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ’s)What happens after my one, two or five year MemVu license expires?After the license expires, you will be prompted for a credit card to continue MemVu at a rate of only $14.95/month per license.  What happens after my tablet and data plan expire?If you wish to continue using the data plan and tablet, you will be required to have a minimum of five MemVu licenses which will be billed to a credit card monthly at $14.95 each.Are there any restrictions with the “Tablet Perk”?Yes, the data is restricted to 1MB per month and the tablets are locked down to only use MemVu unless you use a Wi-Fi connection.  You can however user other resident programs and features included with the tablet that do not require Internet/data usage.What happens if my Tablet breaks?If your tablet breaks or is lost or stolen, you can purchase a replacement tablet at $295 when the broken tablet is returned.  Any warranty repairs or defects will be covered through MemVu and T-Mobile, if need be.  Can I get additional tablets and data without getting additional MemVu licenses?Yes. The monthly fee is $29.95 per month for the tablet and 1MB data plan but the number of tablets cannot exceed the number of MemVu licenses you have.Do I own the tablet outright?If you choose to keep the service active for 24 months, the tablet is yours.  However, if after one year you decide not to continue for any reason, then you must return the tablet in working condition otherwise there is a $200 purchase price.Can I use my Wi-Fi connection to get Internet access?Yes. You can use any other internet connection to use MemVu or even download a video.  If you are on T-Mobile’s data network, you will be restricted to MemVu only since there is a 1GB limit every month. Does MemVu offer any Branding or Marketing Materials for my organization?Yes organizations can actually brand an activity centers they pay for and we can customize collateral for you.  Visit the FAQ section on our web site for examples and details.

story:
LONDON, ENGLAND (UNITED KINGDOM)

Rione Holder is 5 years old. He also goes by the name of Pooh Bear. Unfortunately he has been diagnosed with Wilm’s disease (kidney cancer), which has progressed to the lungs and the para-tracheal area. He also has an obstruction to his superior vena cava, the main blood vessel bringing de-oxygenated blood to the heart. Rione is currently suffering from breathing difficulties. Both the Royal Marsden and Great Ormond Street Hospital have said there is nothing more they can do and predict he has a few weeks to live. His parents refuse to accept he is incurable.

Fortunately Dr Thomas Vogl of the Goethe University Hospital in Frankfurt is prepared to accept him as a patient. He can offer six targeted approaches to cancer rather than the systemic chemotherapy that is on offer here in England. One of Dr Vogl’s ways of tackling the tumours is to use Trans Arterial Chemo Embolisation, which involves identifying the blood supply to the tumour and cutting it off chemically.

Rione is described by his mother as a real family man, who likes nothing better than to have all his friends and family round for a barbecue. Cerone, Rione’s mother says ‘he’s 5 going on 55’. He put a smile on the faces of the doctors and nurses at GOSH with his amiable manner and compliant ways. He loves playing Skylanders and his favourite song is ‘I’m happy’ from the ‘Despicable Me’ film.  Rione would like to become a doctor when he grows up in order to treat children who have the same illness. 

We hope to raise £10,000 altogether to fund Dr Vogl’s pioneering work and to finance natural medicine to improve the terrain that grew the tumours in the first place. Please donate what you can to help give this brave little boy a future. I will send fortnightly updates once treatment starts and update you to his progress throughout the whole process.

Thank you for reading Rione’s story.

story:
Help Families of the Tragic Aurora, Colorado Massacre

Donate any amount now to help out with expensive medical, funeral, and memorial costs.

Today, America is in shock, sadness, disturbance, and is completely baffled over the massacre that occurred on July, 20th 2012 at a movie theater in Aurora, Colorado. The victims and their families will need help with household income, child raising issues, possible extended family financial issues, and any additional costs that they may be burdened as a result of this unspeakable tragedy. America and the world around, let’s show victims, their families, and friends that we love and care for them.

Like us on Facebook to spread the word about this fundraiser: https://www.facebook.com/HelpVictimsInAuroraColorado

There are no words to express the grief most people feel over the senseless tragedy that occurred on July, 20th 2012, but we can show the victim’s and their families how much we feel for them through our generosity and commitment to help others in need.

Any donation amount will help out the financial burden that has been bestowed on the victims and their families. Donate now to help.

There’s very little anyone can do to help with the profound grief and pain the people of Aurora, Colorado’s tragedy are feeling, but what we can do is give them a tiny bit of financial piece of mind. It’s a powerful and extraordinary thing when people come together to spread compassion and help innocent victims and families take care of unexpected financial burdens.

Let the surviving victims and their families know that many people, near and far, want to help them with any donation you can offer.

Our love, compassion, and profound sympathies go out to everyone - to the victims and their families, to friends, and to their community. Let’s unite our human friends and be there for them all!

Aside from the fees Indiegogo imposes, ABSOLUTELY ALL DONATIONS contributed to this campaign will be donated to the victims and the victims families of the Aurora, Colorado Massacre that occurred on July 20th, 2012.

Update (July 24th, 2012):  We are excited to have Colorado Organization for Victim Assistance (COVA) as are official funds distributor. Our contact there is Mandee:1-303-996-2781. Also check out their Facebook page here: https://www.facebook.com/ColoradoCrimeVictims and their official website here: www.ColoradoCrimeVictims.org

COVA will be distrubuting all the funds that we raise through this campaign and we're very grateful to have them onboard!

Please Donate Today.

Thank you!

CJ Lips and Christopher Kornell
helpvictimsincolorado@gmail.com

Like us on Facebook to spread the word about this fundraiser: https://www.facebook.com/HelpVictimsInAuroraColorado

story:
Gravity Centered Golf clubs are designed to eliminate torque and produce straighter shots. More balls in the fairway and more manageable play out of the rough make golf more fun!

Introducing a new paradigm in golf club design-clubs designed to hit the ball straight!

Part of the fascination of golf is that it is a nice balance of not too easy and not too hard. The most interesting courses have the most interesting challenges. If the carry over the water was really short, there would be no feeling of satisfaction to getting over safely. If it was too hard.. but you know what I mean.

What is frustrating is the difficulty built into today's clubs.  They are a big improvement over the ones used by Mary, Queen of Scots, and even the ones used by Bobby Jones, but there's work yet to be done.

Bobby Jones Problems: The three killer defects he overcame

Jones and his contemporaries managed to play brilliant golf with equipment that had three major built-in defects which made hitting the ball straight a real challenge.

1. The centrifugal force of the swing caused the wooden shafts of his time to twist  making a reproducible swing difficult.

2. The golf balls of the Jones era were aerodynamically unstable.

3. Joining the shaft to the edge of the clubhead causes a rotational force called torque which takes the ball away from its intended path. Shots out of the rough  are particularly troubling where the grass amplifies the torque effect.  

Fortunately for most of todays golfers, steel and graphite have reduced the bending and eliminated the twisting problems of the old wooden shaft. Todays golf balls are so much better balanced and aerodynamically sound that it takes a Bubba or a Tiger to shape trajectories. The one major design defect that still remains from the Bobby Jones era is the torque caused by attaching the shaft an inch or more away from where the ball will be struck.

         This remaining defect is what is eliminated with “zero torque “ golf clubs.    

 

 

A Little History of Golf Club Design Evolution

Current golf club design principles originated in the early 1800's. The asymmetrical design produced by attaching the shaft to a corner of the club head produces an inherent torque around the attachment point.The result is that it is easy to hit the ball far but difficult to hit it straight. We think the time for change is long past due. 

  Our design moves the shaft attachment point so that zero torque is produced, resulting in more shots in the fairway, and makes it far easier to hit straight from difficult lies.  

 For the fun of the game 

   

Golfers respect tradition and change comes slowly, but in recent years the design of putters has moved gradually from the ancient blade putter towards more common sense designs which attach the shaft closer to the impact point on the face, reducing torque. The next logical move is to eliminate the torque from the other clubs as well. That's exactly what we have done.

Tom Watson's Advice

The great golfer Tom Watson, winner of many Majors, once suggested that when golfers play their next round, they should try picking up the ball after every shot off the fairway, placing it back in the fairway and playing from there. He was making the point that game is a lot easier and more fun if you play from the fairway and hit the ball straight. Imagine how much lower your score might be and how much more fun you might have if you consistently hit the ball straighter and hit the fairway more. This is exactly what Zero Torque clubs will help you do. 

Market Research and Club Testing

Bob Lansdowne and Associates, a market research firm in Pinehursrt, North Carolina did some consumer testing for us last spring. They tested our clubs using amateurs as well as professionals from different country clubs in the area. When asked what the most important feature for them when buying a driver, 71% said accuracy and 29% said distance.

Our driver has over 30% less dispersion down the fairway than standard drivers without losing any distance. We know this because we tested our clubs with Golf Laboratories (www.golflabs.com), the top golf testing facility in the United States. According to them, our clubs had the best first generation tests compared to any other clubs that have been tested there. 

Early bird pricing. All contribution amounts are based on pre-manufacturing orders for these clubs. Prices will go up an estimated 20% or more once in full production. All Zero Torque clubs are made of the same high tech material used by major manufacturers.

Drivers have titanium heads, graphite shafts. Three wood, five wood and hybrids have stainless steel heads and grahite shafts.All clubs have Wynn-Tac Sta-dry grips.

Zero torque clubs are not manufactured until customer orders are received.The picture below shows the Zero Torque driver you will receive if you check off the sidebar contribution of $129. Next to it is a major manufacturer's driver which costs almost three times as much.

Let 's say you really need  a straight drive on the next hole, the one with the creek up one side and trees down the other.  Which design just shouts out "let's hit this ball in the fairway?"

Not too much to think about is there?

Once you try Zero Torque clubs, you will not want to hit anything else. Don't just take our word for it, though. Donate today and any of our clubs can be yours in a few months!  

 

The Zero Torque 3-wood. Hits straighter out of the fairway or the rough than any other club we've tested. A contribution of $99 will cement your place in the next production run.

 

 

 

Zero Torque Hybrids $79 each, two for $149, all three $219 -available in 20, 23, and 27 degrees

 

 The Funding 

We are now working with the second generation design and have had prototype clubs tested. We know they perform. In order to introduce them widely to golfers we plan to demonstrate them at the PGA annual merchandise show (http://www.pgashow.com). It will take $20,000 to complete the latest design modifications to some of the clubs, and to stock inventory, and rent display and range test spaces at the merchandise show.  

 

A great gift idea.  

Even if you are not a golfer yourself a Zero Torque golf club is a memorable gift for special occasions, birthdays, promotions or holidays. If you order before December 20 a special Christmas gift card will be sent to the lucky recipient. If later, a regular gift notification will be sent. 

Your lucky golfer friend will understand instantly what you have given. Straight shots and better golf scores.

Corporate Gifts 

Want to give a gift to your best customers, or perhaps a memento of a Campaign Kick Off ?  Why not something memorable, that they can get nowhere else? The fountain pens and T shirts are great, but the Zero Torque golf clubs will be with them on every fairway for a long time.

 


 

We will also include a note suggesting the recipient should not swing these clubs too freely in the house. Spring is on the way as usual. Be patient.

 

A final note:


Thirty years ago the introduction of large head tennis racquets changed that game forever. They looked a little different but they made the game more fun for more people and raised the standard of play for everyone. Clubs that hit the ball straighter will do the same thing for golf. Zero Torque golf clubs because in golf, "Nothing  beats straight" 

Thanks. For watching our video. For thinking about the next ,needed, revolution in golf club design. For telling your friends what a great idea you think this is. (You were planning to tell them , weren't you?) Thanks for helping take a big step towards making golf a lot more fun for a lot more people. 

The management at Gravity Centered Golf, creators of Zero Torque Golf Clubs.

Jack Morrissey, CEO

John Morrissey, Science and Engineering Advisor 

Jack Morrissey Jr., IT Director

Alex Shockley, Web Designer and IT Consultant

story:
What is WebLively?

Hi, we're the team from WebLively.  We are a group of wellness practitioners, health visionaries and web / database engineers from Portland, Oregon.

WebLively empowers wellness professionals and the clients they serve to collaboratively manage their health with secure access to user-friendly tools and resources.  We want to empower people to direct their own health and wellness.  Our vision is for all people to own and manage their personal health data and records for free.

We are rolling out a way for professionals to collaborate with each other accross disciplines to better serve their clients. What we want to do next is allow clients to begin managing their health data and take control of their wellness goals. We think it's a great idea and could be the start of a revolutionary new paradigm in health care, but we need your help.

We need to raise $22,000 to cover the cost of software development for our next phase of growth. We're turning to you because we feel you are our strongest supporters. Be part of building this new healthcare solution.  In exchange for your contribution, we're offering some awesome perks. With your help, we can get WebLively off the ground and open it up to those who it will benefit the most: you.

Thanks for your support!

Where is the money going?

Right now, we have the professional side of the site up in beta.  We are using IndieGoGo because we need to get the client side up and running.  With this, clients will be able to create a free account, log in, manage their health records, connect with professionals, and start achieving their wellness goals.

Our vision.

When WebLively is fully online, it will empower people to take charge of their health data and make it easier for them to reach their wellness goals.  On the professional side of things, it will allow practitioners to collaborate with each other to help their clients reach those goals.  With a secure, HIPPA-compliant platform clients and professionals will feel confident about sharing their data. 

What you get!

Remember, WebLively clients will be able to create a free account.  We will be charging a modest monthly fee for professionals once we have completed beta testing.

$2 - Everything helps! - You will get a recognition leaf on our Giving Vine, which will be located on our donations page.
 
$10 - Start your journey. - You will get your name on our vine and a WebLively sticker.
 
$25 - Set your goals. - You will receive a bigger leaf on the vine and a bigger sticker, a bumper sticker!
 
$50 - Take charge of your health. - Name on vine and a metal WebLively water bottle.
 
$60 - Empower my clients. - (professional option) Name on vine and a free 1 year membership for professionals.
 
$140 - Health revolutionary - You will receive special recognition on our vine page, a sticker, and a WebLively t-shirt.
 
$600 - Champion for wellness. - (professional option) Lifetime membership to WebLively, sticker, water bottle, a t-shirt, and special recognition on our vine page.

$1000 - Health superhero. - T-shirt, water bottle, a limited edition aluminum print (sample below) from Peter Blanchard - local Portland photographer (www.manifestphoto.com), and your own WebLively founders page on our website.

$1200 - Bringing it to the people. - (professional option) Lifetime membership to WebLively, a t-shirt, a water bottle, a limited edition aluminum print (sample below) from Peter Blanchard - local Portland photographer (www.manifestphoto.com), and your own WebLively founders page on our website.
 

Other ways you can support us.

If you'd still like to help out, but can't contribute, don't worry!  Tell your friends and family about us. Get the word out - follow us on Twitter and like us on Facebook!  Bake some cookies with our logo and pass them around. Anything helps, let's do this!

When WebLively is fully online, it will empower people to take charge of their health data and make it easier for them to reach their wellness goals.  On the professional side of things, it will allow practitioners to collaborate with each other to help their clients reach those goals.  With a secure, HIPPA-compliant platform clients and professionals will feel confident about sharing their data. 
What you get!
Remember, WebLively clients will be able to create a free account.  We will be charging a modest monthly fee for professionals once we have completed beta testing.
$2 - Everything helps! - You will get a recognition leaf on our Giving Vine, which will be located on our donations page.
 
$10 - Start your journey. - You will get your name on our vine and a WebLively sticker.
 
$25 - Set your goals. - You will receive a bigger leaf on the vine and a bigger sticker, a bumper sticker!
 
$50 - Take charge of your health. - Name on vine and a metal WebLively water bottle.
 
$60 - Empower my clients. - (professional option) Name on vine and a free 1 year membership for professionals.
 
$140 - Health revolutionary - You will receive special recognition on our vine page, a sticker, and a WebLively t-shirt.
 
$600 - Champion for wellness. - (professional option) Lifetime membership to WebLively, sticker, water bottle, a t-shirt, and special recognition on our vine page.
$1000 - Health superhero. - T-shirt, water bottle, a limited edition aluminum print (sample below) from Peter Blanchard - local Portland photographer (www.manifestphoto.com), and your own WebLively founders page on our website.
$1200 - Bringing it to the people. - (professional option) Lifetime membership to WebLively, a t-shirt, a water bottle, a limited edition aluminum print (sample below) from Peter Blanchard - local Portland photographer (www.manifestphoto.com), and your own WebLively founders page on our website.
 

Other ways you can support us.

If you'd still like to help out, but can't contribute, don't worry!  Tell your friends and family about us. Get the word out - follow us on Twitter and like us on Facebook!  Bake some cookies with our logo and pass them around. Anything helps, let's do this!

story:
A Few Words from "Lil Grim"...

Want to have the last word, forever? Myowneulogy.com allows you to do just that!  Your video message can be played at your funeral or wake, addressing your family, friends and foes.  You can send a specific message to anyone with an e-mail address in the future long after you’re gone.  But, we need your help to add features to the site and make sure your life memories are saved for eternity.

Alba Carrico and Jan Knight, Owners of  Two Divas & A Dream LLC, came up with the idea of myowneulogy.com after attending several funerals of close friends and family, noticing the eulogies didn't begin to describe the true nature of the deceased.  Why not, they thought, create a website where you can upload your own eulogy, and be remembered the way you truly are?

 

What we need ...

The $50,000 goal will help with costs needed to add more functionality, cover the expense of costly video hosting, and revamp the overall look of the site. 

  • You contribution will help alleviate the cost of cloud video hosting which is extremely expensive, especially when there are thousands of videos.
  • Add a pre-scheduling option (so you can send your video on a specific date to your loved ones.... Like a "Happy Birthday" message from the other side).
  • Add Wall of Fame - we want to acknowledge and immortalize those who helped make this possible with their contributions.  
  • Add resources, links we love, top 10 funeral songs you can purchase, tips, etc.
  • Make the site more user friendly, streamline video uploading, etc.

 

Never Let Them Forget...

We want you to be remembered how you are now, not how someone else may portray you after you're gone.  Let your grandchildren, great-grandchildren and future generations get to know you.  You can be remembered forever.

  

No Spare Change?

Just because you can’t contribute, doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Spread the word!  Even if you can't help us out with a donation, you can help in a big way by sharing our story and our site.
  • Share our indiegogo link - you never know who is out there just waiting for something they can throw some money at....  Remember.... you can't take it with you!

story:
Stealth Makes Core Exercise Fun, Effective and Time Saving

Stealth is the very first video game integrated core trainer. Forget boring crunches. Imagine having fun while you exercise, focusing on high scores instead of counting out reps. Stealth brings mobile gaming into your workouts so you can get results by having fun.  In less than 3 minutes a day, you can fit your core training workout in to your schedule as easily as brushing your teeth.

Getting started with Stealth couldn’t be easier. Just download the Stealth gaming app, place your smartphone into the designated slot, get into the plank position and start playing. Believe us when we say: "You'll forget you are even working out!"

With the unique experience Stealth offers, it's not surprising top press has begun to take notice!

 Stealth Games

Our games are currently in the beta phase and as a Kickstarter backer, you'll have exclusive control over how our games improve over time. Not only will you be able to help us pick our very first game releases but we'll also open the doors to independent game developers to help us create games of any level of sophistication. What's the only rule for Stealth games? They have to be tons of fun! You okay with that?!

We're starting simple and fun but there is no end to the complexity we can inject into these games together. Be a part of helping us build and test games by backing our project so we can bring a whole new level of play to the gym.

Stealth’s mini-games are designed to never play out the same way, so you'll always be in store for something new and exciting. The unlimited number of gameplay combinations keeps your mind and your core guessing -- leading to muscle confusion and improved results!

How Does Stealth Work?

Stealth carefully calibrates with your phone’s motion detector to recognize every movement you make. It then translates those movements into gameplay actions on the screen of your smartphone. Other games use motion controls but never before has any game been designed to mirror core training movements that hit 29 different muscles. Stealth truly is the beginning of a new era of virtual reality. The decisions and moves you make to improve in the game will result in lasting results in your real life training progress.

How much does the first stealth game cost? The Stealth app is completely free to download and will come with at least 1 game. It might even come with more than that if we reach a few of our stretch goals together! So, as soon as you tear off Stealth's packaging, you'll be able to immerse yourself in core training gameplay right away!

 

Stealth Uses All Available Dimensions

Your core includes many more muscle groups than just your abs. Although tons of our movements focus on the rectus abdominis (the muscles in your belly area) others will blast key areas of your core such as your obliques and lower back. With Stealth's unique, fluid design, you'll have no limitations on your gameplay or training freedom.

Stealth’s games will have you twisting, turning and rotating 360 degrees to earn high scores; both in the game and with your physique.

The ability to move forward and backward and side to side is great but we are in the business of pushing the boundaries here! That's why Stealth games will also have you moving your body laterally, hitting parts of your core that few other ab trainers even reach. With Stealth's 360 degree freedom there will never be any limitation on your gameplay or workout.

This huge degree of movement fluidity is part of what makes Stealth such an effective core trainer. You’ll just feel like you’re playing games but you’ll actually be performing sophisticated core training movements that leave no muscle group behind. You just focus on collecting all those in-game upgrades and let Stealth work its super-smart core training magic.

Stealth Benefits

We all know that exercise is a key part of optimal health. But, who hasn't had trouble sticking to a regular exercise regime from time to time? Truth is, the biggest benefits from working out come from consistency and adherence to a program. The unique twist Stealth brings to exercise makes it the easiest program to stick to ever.

Have you ever come up with some half-baked excuse to get out of playing games with your buddies like you do to avoid going to the gym? Of course not! With Stealth, you'll be looking forward to every single workout so consistency will come automatically. By sticking to the Stealth program you'll enjoy the following benefits:

 

 

How Should I use Stealth?

Just like good old Tetris and every well-designed game since, Stealth's games feature appropriate intensity settings for everyone. Stealth is great for core training novices and hardcore ab junkies alike.

No lifestyle these days is quite the same, so everyone fits in their workouts in different ways. Are you just starting out when it comes to core training? Try using Stealth in the privacy of your own home to get your workout in bright and early. A morning Stealth gaming session will get your mind and body energized for the day!

In contrast, maybe you're a seasoned core training veteran looking for a new challenge to break through those plateaus? Perfect! Stealth is ready to bring it! Simply turn up the dial on the intensity levels of Stealth's games and it will throw everything but the kitchen sink at you. With Stealth's unpredictability and movement fluidity you'll feel the burn regardless of your intensity levels and be crushing your plateaus in no time.

Regardless of your intensity preferences, there is really no limitation on how or where you can use Stealth. Stealth comes fully assembled and is easy to bring anywhere so you can hit your core and get your game on anytime, anywhere.

Don't forget to get your partner in on the core training action! Grinding it out at the gym and counting out reps together can get old pretty quickly. That's why Stealth helps add some excitement to your training sessions together.

 

What's Stealth Made Of?

At Stealth, we've put tons of work into our product design to create a platform capable of keeping up with the intense gameplay action of the Stealth app while maximizing workout comfort. Careful thought was put into the balance and angles of Stealth's movement to ensure it feels natural and comfortable. Stealth also features an antibacterial, sweat-resistant padding so you can hold your plank all day without feeling the slightest bit uncomfortable.

Stealth's design is completely unique and gives it its signature range of motion. By joining the Stealth movement you'll be supporting revolutionary software and engineering all at once!

story:
[please scroll down for English translation]

Gözde Becerikli

Moda tasarım alanında 2 yarışma birinciliğini tatmış ve şimdi de devam etmekte olduğu resim alanındaki yüksek lisansına büyük bir hırsla devam etmekte. Bu seneki hedefi; kendi içine dönük soyut resim çalışmalarını hayata geçirmek. Sanata olan bu tutkusu, yaşadığı zorluklara rağmen bitmedi ve sadece hayata tutunmak istiyor.

Yumuşak Doku Sarkomu

Gözde Becerikli'nin 2006 yılında Yumuşak Doku Sarkoma teşhisiyle kanser hikayesi başlamış oldu. 15 milyonda 1 oranda görülen bu kanser tipi, özellikle karın bölgesindeki komşu organlarda gelişmesiyle, daha da ender bir vaka haline geldi. Bugüne kadar 8 kere yendiği bu düşman 2 sene ara verdikten sonra kendisini tekrar ziyaret etti. Kullandığı kemoterapi ilaçlarına ve radyoterapi tedavilerine cevap vermeyen Gözde, sadece cerrahi girişimlerle hayatta kalmakta. Sizlerden tek dileği 9. ameliyatını sorunsuzca atlatmasına yardım etmeniz. Tüm güzel dilekleriyle sizden gelecek yardımları beklemekte.

Ameliyat Masrafları

Karaciğerin hemen altına yerleşmiş olan tümörün zor bir ameliyatla alınması gerekmekte. Profesör doktorlar tarafından gerçekleştirmesi gereken ameliyatın zorluk derecesi yüksek olduğundan ameliyat masrafları da yüksek olacak.
Hedefe ulaşılamaması durumunda bile en azından toplanan miktar, ameliyat masraflarını karşılamakta büyük yardım olacak.

Desteğiniz bizim için çok değerli.


[ENGLISH version]

Gözde Becerikli

Winning 2 contests on Fashion Design and continuing her masters degree on Painting with a great ambition, Gözde is pursuing her dream in life. Her aim this year is to focus on abstract paintings. Her passion on arts is keeping her alive, regardless of the set-backs she goes through about her health.
 

Soft Tissue Sarcoma

Having diagnosed with Soft Tissue Sarcoma in 2006, her cancer story began. This being a 1 in 15 millions chance and additionally having it around the abdominal area, made it even a very rare case. The 8-times-defeated enemy, re-visited her after 2 years of silence. Not responding to chemo meds and radiotherapy, left her with surgical options only to stay alive. Her only wish from you is your support on getting through her 9th surgery.  


Surgery Expenses

Being located right under her liver, the tumor needs to be removed with a harder-than-usual surgery which will be performed by professor doctors who are experts of their respective work areas. So the operation costs will be relatively high due to the difficulty of the surgery.
Even if we cannot reach the goal, your support will greatly help us on covering the expenses, even partially.
Your contribution to her fight is very valuable for us.

story:
I'm riding in the Canary Challenge 2015 to raise money for cancer research

My friend Leslie Mah, for whom Team Mahssive is named, has been battling cancer for the past two years. Being the shero that she is, Leslie has also been a huge advocate for screening and education, and has saved at least two people so far.

Leslie has also been a big supporter of cancer research. She's riding in the Canary Challenge this year (the 50k), and she and her wife Jen Burton have rallied a bunch of us to form Team Mahssive.

Cancer has hit my community hard. It took my grandmother and, just a few months ago, my uncle. A friend passed away last year. My dad got lucky and got early treatment because of accidental detection. And several friends in addition to Leslie have been battlilng it. Please help us fight cancer with a donation today!

The Canary Challenge, a premier cycling and fundraising event to benefit the Canary Foundation.  Funds raised by the Canary Challenge go directly to the cancer early detection research and innovative clinical programs through the Canary Foundation. The funds I raise will stay right here, helping with diagnosis, early detection and treatment for this disease.

Consider these facts:

• Cancer strikes about one in three women and one in two men in the U.S.

• In 2014, new cancer cases were estimated to total 171,330 in CA and 1.7 million in the US.

• Chances of survival are greater if cancer is diagnosed when still confined to the organ of origin (stage I).  Survival rates decline as tumors enlarge and spread regionally (stages II, III) or distantly (stage IV).

Early detection saves lives by identifying cancers when they are most curable.

I will raise at least $500 but will try to push myself to raise as much as possible. I’ll spend months training, fundraising and preparing for the Challenge. I’m very excited about doing it because many of us have been affected by cancer, either personally or through a family member or friend. I can’t do it without your help. 

Please join me in supporting the Canary Foundation and their research in early cancer detection.

Thank you in advance for partnering with me.

story:
Get in on the ground floor as the Saint Paul Yoga Center celebrates its 20th year!


Yes, it’s been 20 years since SPYC first opened its doors — that’s two decades worth of feet, hands, sit bones, and shoulders on the studio’s wood floors. And we look forward to at least 20 more years of helping students find their equilibrium.


But a balanced practice begins with a stable base, and the floor in the Selby Studio is close to 100 years old — uneven, unsightly, and unsteady. So as we celebrate our anniversary year, we’re replacing our ancient floor with a brand new, hard wood floor.


Imagine the feel of a smooth, even surface under your feet in standing poses or the luxury of stretching out in Savasana on an unblemished wood floor.


What can YOU do to help?

We estimate that a new floor will cost at least $10,000. We’re asking students and friends of the studio help us defray the cost, so we can install the floor over our summer break in August. When we start up again in September, we’ll be thoroughly grounded!


20 for 20 Campaign

Every penny counts, but we hope you’ll consider donating at least $20 — one dollar for every year that SPYC has been in existence — toward the cost of replacing the floor in the Selby Studio. Or multiply that amount by 2, 3, 4, or 5 times, and contribute 40, 60, 80, 100 dollars or more.
