Imagine the feel of a smooth, even surface under your feet in standing poses or the luxury of stretching out in Savasana on an unblemished wood floor.What can YOU do to help? We estimate that a new floor will cost at least $10,000. We’re asking students and friends of the studio help us defray the cost, so we can install the floor over our summer break in August. When we start up again in September, we’ll be thoroughly grounded! 20 for 20 CampaignEvery penny counts, but we hope you’ll consider donating at least $20 — one dollar for every year that SPYC has been in existence — toward the cost of replacing the floor in the Selby Studio. Or multiply that amount by 2, 3, 4, or 5 times, and contribute 40, 60, 80, 100 dollars or more.

story:
My father, Allen Schrock was not in the best of health, but he was self-sufficient enough to take care of himself.  One day in March of 2015 he fell and spent 24 hours on the floor before he was found.

In that time his body literally started breaking down to the point that his doctors only gave him a 33% chance of surviving.  He did survive, but his quality of life is a fraction of what it was before the fall.

I am creating the Allen Band (named after my father) to help families get their aging parents and grandparents the help the need as quickly as possible when they fall or need assistance.  If I would have found my father in four hours instead of 24 hours, I could have prevented much of his tissue damage and he would still be enjoying a good quality of life.

What Exactly is the Allen Band?


The Allen Band is a slim, stylish band that monitors a senior's heart rate, body temperature and mobility.  It sends automated alerts to family members (we call them Caregivers) if something is wrong or the wearer needs help.  It is very much like Life Alert but without any monthly monitoring fees whatsoever.

Most devices like LifeAlert and MedicalAlert provide users with free hardware up front, but then saddle users with $41.95/month multi-year contracts for monitoring.   A typical senior will spend over $7,500 in monitoring expenses alone while using a Life Alert system over a 15 year period.

The Idea behind the Allen Band is that the user pays a one-time cost (estimated at $399) for the Allen Band, and receives free monitoring services for life. The Allen Band can provide families with superior, personalized monitoring options while allowing seniors to stay at home where they want to be.

Free Monitoring for Life

Free monitoring may seem too good to be true, but with today’s technology it is easily achievable. All of the current major senior monitoring systems rely on a pendant / base system that links the user directly to a live monitoring call center. These monitoring centers are extremely expensive to operate and are the driving expense behind existing cost-prohibitive monitoring devices.

The Allen Band is different. Rather than routing emergency events to a call center, the Allen Band uses the Internet to directly notify family, friends, or even neighbors that mom or dad needs help.

When a loved one falls, is inactive for an extended period of time, or experiences an event that is detected by the Allen Band, the band will ask the senior user if they are OK. If the senior user presses the OK button no alert is sent to family.  If the SOS button is pressed instead, a text message, email, and/or push notification is sent to the seniors’ caregivers letting them know what happened and that help is needed.

More than Just an SOS Button


The Allen Band does offer senior users the ability to signal for help by double-pressing the SOS button, but it is more than just a panic button. The Allen Band uses the latest 21st century technology to measure specific biometric readings. The Allen Band can measure:

  • Heart Rate
  • Body Temperature (is there a fever or hypothermic state)
  • Sudden Falls
  • Lack of Motion Over an Extended Period
  • Connectivity Issues (No communication from the Allen Band)
  • Battery Status Issues (when battery is low, Caregiver is alerted)
  • GPS Location (using phone's location services)
     

All of this data is sent to the monitoring cloud at regular intervals and each caregiver can ask the cloud monitoring system to alert them based on their own levels of concern.

This eliminates the need for a call center to monitor each user, eliminating the monitoring costs. Each Allen Band can send alerts to up to 2 Caregivers at no cost whatsoever.

Additional Caregivers can be added for $1.00 per month per Caregiver. The Caregiver, not the senior user, pays the $1.00 monthly monitoring charge to be added to the account. We use these small $1.00 payments to cover the cloud server monitoring expenses.

Monitoring Options That are as Mobile as You Are

Unlike traditional pendant / base monitoring solutions, the Allen band will communicate with the cloud over WiFi or via a Bluetooth connected smartphone. That means your Allen Band can monitor your loved ones at home or on the go.

If a senior suffers a fall or needs to quickly and easily ask for help, a double button press on the Allen Band immediately alerts Caregivers to the need.  The Allen Band pulls the senior's GPS location from their smartphone and includes with the alert so Caregivers know where to send help.

Stylish and Discrete

We conducted over 100 interviews with seniors who have used or considered using the pendant / base monitoring systems.

The leading consideration in a senior user’s decision to use an existing system was the monthly cost of monitoring followed closely by the stigma that is associated with the large and ugly wearable pendants.

One respondent said she wouldn’t use a LifeAlert system even if she needed it because it was like “wearing a giant I am infirm" sign around her neck. Another stated that she was 63 years old and probably needed a pendant but wouldn’t wear it because “it just isn’t cool.”

The Allen Band will be designed to look like a slim fitness tracker. It even tells time! No one but the senior user and his/her caregivers will know that the Allen Band is hard at work. That is the way it should be.

Why Indiegogo?

Myself and my team of 15 employees at Schrock Innovations have successfully developed and marketed products like our Modular Computer Systems, PC security software like Secure Updater, and even our own Modular 10.1" Tablet.  We have a track record of identifying needs and successfully developing products to fill those needs.

But the Allen Band is a different type of project.  When we approached our SBA lenders seeking funds for the project they thought this was a great idea, but they wanted to see a monthly monitoring fee that would "save or create" multiple jobs.

The whole point of the Allen Band is to create a senior monitoring solution that had no monthly monitoring costs.  A monitoring center would certainly create a lot of jobs, but they are expensive.  We were not willing to abandon our free-monitoring principle, and as a result they were not willing to fund this project through traditional methods.

We have received an outpouring of fan support on our Allen Band Facebook page as well as emails and phone calls from people who want to help.  We decided that Indiegogo was the best way to fund the project and also collect valuable opinions and design advice by making our supporters part of the design process.

I have personally invested over $9,000 in this project to get it to where it is now, and I plan on spending more of my own money to make this device a reality.  My dad needs the Allen Band, and hundreds of others have asked us when they can buy one.  I would not ask you to back a project that I am not backing myself.

Our goal of $22,750 is enough for us to have the Allen Band designed and prototyped in a Chinese factory.  We would really love to design and build this in the U.S. If we can raise sufficient funding (4 times our goal) we should be able to build the Allen Band in America!  Please consider this as you are contributing!

What We Have Accomplished So Far

Since May we have completed a hardware design document and submitted it to several factories in the US and China for prototype development. We are currently working with the MultiGold Corporation in China to begin developing the molds and main board for the device.

We have selected TPE (thermo-plastic) for the construction of the band due to its flexibility, comfort, and durability.

MultiGold has informed us that the device prototype will take 6-8 months to produce. MultiGold is creating the prototype CAD drawings and we are working together to select the correct chipsets that will maximize battery life, reduce weight and bulk, and allow us to create a streamlined, attractive design.

We have also started the development of the cloud monitoring system that will receive data transmissions from the Allen Band and send alerts to Caregivers automatically.

The factory will be developing the iOS and Android apps for smartphones, and link them with the cloud system's API. Schrock Innovations Computer Company's staff is coding the desktop PC application that will allow those without smartphones to pair the Allen Band to their wireless network in their homes.

The next step is to finalize the prototype design and produce 15 Alpha devices for field testing. We expect to field test on real seniors for a period no less than 30 days. This testing will focus on the utility of the design, ease of operation for seniors, and the accurate collection of data by the Allen Band and correctly processing that data in the cloud to send appropriate alerts.

Revisions will be made to the design if required. Each design revision will take between 30-60 days to finalize and produce another 15 units for field testing. Again, the new units will be tested for 30 days to ensure any issues with the initial design have been corrected.

Once we have a prototype that tests successfully, mass-production of 1,000 units will begin and should take 30-45 days to complete.

The units will be made available to backers at that time first. Subsequently any contributor who gave $350 or more will receive their units first.  After our contributors are fulfilled, the Allen Band will be available for purchase form the Allen Band website, as well as our Schrock Innovations Service Centers. Other distribution channels will be opened as needed to mass-market further production runs.

We expect the design, development, and production process to wrap up in late 2016 with a targeted distribution date of December 2016.

story:
WHAT IS SEEK AND FIND 'SknFnd'
SknFnd is a complete, holistic, portable security solution with built in security, safety and sensing technology. This mean in short that its the unit that give information if something happens.. The SknFnd unit automatically alerts an operator in the event of a dangerous or risky situation. The unit issues live information, based on it's cutting edge sensor technology to an operator or to a mobile phone.

FOR THE USER:
SknFnd includes the back-end system, end-user equipment and over the air technology that can be used to save lives if a person finds themselves in a dangerous situation.  The system functions in a manner akin to a personal "Black Box" as popularised in the aircraft industry.


1) The device can use a range of sensors to monitor speed, altitude, shock, distance, temperature and humidity.

2) When the device detects significant changes to these parameters it sends an alert to the user to ascertain if all is well or if assistance is required.

3) If the user is unable to respond, a SknFnd operator becomes engaged and will manage the incident; alerting the emergency services of the situation where appropriate.

Each SknFnd device is installed with an “eCall” module that connects via GPS giving the device location with near pin-point global accuracy to within 1 metre.  Therefore, if a person is injured this will enable their location to be ascertained quickly and aid to be dispatched in a timely fashion.
 

This SknFnd unit is outfitted with both a G and temperature sensor.  The unit will have the possibility to be updated over the air (OTA) so the end-user can use it for differing purposes for example sporting activities, security functions, safety functions, etc. 

The unit and indeed, the whole system will work globally.  There is no need to change or add additional SIM cards.  All that is required is the SIM included with the unit at purchase.

TIMELINE, PR 1. NOV 2012:

Completed to-date:
1) Working prototype with integration to back-end and activation on ‘over-the-air’ network. The technology for the user-interface and physical device is developed 'in-house', the technology is patent pended and developed in Norway, Canada and in the UK.

2) Patents registered
Patent info:
1) Apparatus, systems and methods for programmable SIM card using over the air communicated instructions.
2) Seek and Find Location method, system and apparatures.

3) Back-end and Information system v1. With ‘over-the-air’ activation, real-time trace, activation of services online (G-sensor, temperature sensor, billing, etc)

Under development:
1) New Design on the portal.

2) Seek and Find technology for production – Completion estimated Q1, 2013. The unit will have the same function as the working prototype.

TEAM:
We are a team of 5 technologists based in Norway, Oslo and the United Kingdom, Oxford.

WHATS NEXT:
With help from you, we can bring this solution to the global market.  The next step is for the industrialisation the unit and backend system and to then to engage further visionaries to further progress product development.

Risks and challenges

Similar to many projects, we face several key risks and challenges in sparking this revolution in the security sector. The primary risks for us include:

ENGINEERING

To achieve the level of simplicity in user experience that we have, we have to design and engineer a very complex system. We have taken two key steps to ensure our engineering success. 1) We have formed an amazing team of engineers and designers from Oxford and Toronto, and 2) we have developed 3 prototypes (back-end systems, end-user equipment and Communication between the equipment and back-end). When we started this project in 2009 we have developed alpha and beta units/back-end systems. We have worked fastidiously for 4 years to find the best possible team with expertise in disperate and cutting-edge technologies.

SUPPLY CHAIN AND LOGISTICS

Many campaigns can encounter problems when taking their prototypes to production. This includes issues finding suppliers and engineering products for mass-production. We have written 1 patent (currently pending) for the virutal mobile technology based on mass production of the equipment. This includes finding partners that can mass produce the unit/system without any excessive usage of manpower. We have seen that this is one of the major risk to produce a product with zero / fewer fauts.

We have taken this lesson seriously and have been working for over 2 years negotiating with suppliers, component providers, and building a team that can deliver on our promises. Our plans are in place, and we now require the financial capital to execute them.

TEAM

Finding the right people is a challenge for any endeavor. We are now currently housing our Cloud technology/system in Toronto, with a provider that serves critical healthcare and social systems. We are 4 people focused on quality for the users. Success in this area demands a team of talented, passionate, and motivated designers, engineers, and entrepreneurs.

We have already formed a pool of talented people, but we will have to bring in more visionaries to realise our dream. In fact, we are looking for people in the Engineering, Design, Technical and Sales/Distribution/Country Managers.

story:
The RedClay Club announces new European RedClay court technology as the grass-roots foundation for a new safer school sport to offer our children. 
See our April 2016 national Press Release here announcing our School Initiative supported by this campaign, and the 5-Year plan to assimilate RedClay tennis into schools as a safer alternative to contact sports like football.
We want schools to teach children something they can play and enjoy for a lifetime.
Official RedClay Club sponsorships will help the RedClay School Initiative bring innovative, affordable European RedClay to American schools and start a whole new sporting culture in America.  Just like soccer from Europe did 30 years ago.

Nina's entire article on clay tennis, quoted above.

Serena Williams, World #1, quoted in Paris at the French Open on traditional European red clay courts:  “I love the clay. I love to slide!”

Serena and the new RedClay Club agree, so please join us to spread the word!



A 2016 U.S. patent just announced by RCUSA makes the amazing TF2 RedClay court innovation from Germany marketable, affordable and practical... so kids can get out and "play in the dirt".   

Here's How and Why it can Happen Now:

From:  USTA 

To:  RedClay USA 

“I’m pleased to learn that you connected with  Scott Schultz [current USTA University Managing Director] on this initiative and I share his excitement about your plans to develop red clay courts in the U.S.”

Gordon Smith

Executive Director/COO, USTA



"Thank you USTA!  We believe new German RedClay court technology and the new RedClay Club can help grow healthy lifestyles by rethinking American tennis with affordable, practical RedClay courts," --- 

The RedClay School Initiative Team 


This may be the national initiative that U.S. schools and the tennis world have been waiting for. Let's welcome our children to the next imported European classic...  


                                         


The new RedClayClub.com, founded by RCUSA, is the proud voice of our exciting new national School Initiative! 

Contributors to this grassroots school campaign become lifetime RedClay Club members as they receive their perks.  See redclayclub.com for RedClay promotional items to wear.





The amazing TF2 RedClay court innovation finally knocks down the cost barriers of tennis for most Americans, reinforcing our effort to launch this cultural shift away from typical American hard courts for tennis.  

       

The RedClay School Initiative is centered around the newly patented European RedClay court technology, which breaks down the cost barrier for affordable clay tennis courts - - anywhere, even in U.S. climates where water must be conserved. 

RedClay tennis is a timely alternative and compliment to the more problematic contact sports one plays as a youth.  

What Our Campaign Funds:  

It awards financial grants up to $25,000 to a limited number of schools and clubs to install their first TF2 courts used for their pilot-projects.  Our goal of $100,000 will help launch and operate our first pilot project sites listed here, and allow for additional first-come first-serve school sites through a successful on-going campaign.

What You Receive in Perks:

By contributing you can receive an early-bird court installation price.  Please contact us directly for details. Contributions and sponsorships can be tailored if you'd like to support your particular school or club choice by contacting us at: info@redclayusa.com.

Who We Are:

RCUSA LLC, and its RedClay Club and global partners, Tennis Force Intl. GmbH, and Sportas GmbH, are working to create TF2 RedClay court facilities around the world.  RCUSA is the exclusive USA distributor for Tennis Force products.

             

What Is TF2 RedClay?

We believe TF2 RedClay is the finest court innovation since clay tennis was invented.  

TF2® RedClay, and is real terra cotta clay, just like that used in French Open courts, but now with dramatically improved functionality by mixing in proprietary polymers during a new installation process!  

It's that simple.  

It was awarded the most innovative tennis product in Germany for 2009 by German Tennis Magazine. 

It's real red clay without the prohibitive maintenance of a traditional clay tennis court, with 90% of those costs eliminated.  And the periodical resurfacing expense, associated with hard or traditional courts, is never needed with TF2.

It's the easiest surface to learn and teach on.  Easiest on the body.  RedClay turns young students of the game into lifelong players - - constant players who love the exhilaration of sliding and competing, not just being fans.

The German-engineered TF2 court technology means the USA no longer needs to "asphalt-over" the continuous acceptance of hard-court induced injuries. 

Please see more details and specifications about our new court technology at redclayusa.com and tennis-force.com. 

                              

                                           The 1.5" TF2 RedClay base.


Clay courts can finally come out of the country and private clubs! TF2 RedClay court technology really means "clay without the cost", and a truer all-weather court.  Play during or right after rain, and it's also frost resistant. The lines are permanent and never need maintenance. 

School pilot-projects build TF2 courts with the help of grants made possible by contributions to this campaign.  

RedClay tennis can make learning tennis easier, so children and adults will tend to "stick with it" for a lifetime.


Quote:  

Teaching Pro Kevin Sorenson, Top-Tennis Club, Germany:

"After playing on our new TF2 outdoor courts, our longtime club members prefer to play on the new TF2 rather than our traditional older red clay courts, as they stay in top condition with virtually no maintanence."

 

The TF technology is used since 2009 by the WTA Porsche Grand Prix tournament in Stuttgart, the largest indoors women's tournament in the world. This is the first time a professional tournament is played on innovative clay that does not require watering!

See Porsche Stadium, Stuttgart photo below:


Quote:

WTA Touring Pro Coach Andy Fitzpatrick:  

"I am very impressed with the Tennis-Force court... it's an exciting  improvement over traditional RedClay from Europe!  They are more ideal than the French Open courts, because they're always in great condition with consistent safe sliding."


RCUSA and redclayclub.com also seek School Initiative corporate partners as Official Sponsors.  Please see perks and contact us directly for exclusives at:  info@redclayusa.com


And, may we suggest to the Miami Open

...a change to TF2 RedClay to become America's first WTA/ATP RedClay professional tennis tournament!  
Here's the actual Miami Stadium and what it would look like with TF2 RedClay (it's photoshopped!)...but that's a real Miami sunset!


Advantages of TF2 RedClay for the Miami Open:  
1.  Play continues even in moderate rain conditions. 
2.  Play can resume immediately after heavy rain stops, because TF2 RedClay is very water permeable and the surface is clear of puddled water.
3.  Sliding is very exciting to watch live...and we don't see enough of it in America!
Read No. 3 as, "Mom, Dad...I want to do that!", a quote from your all-American seven-year old boy or girl!

RCUSA and its global partners have grand plans for "courting" America's youth and letting kids fall in love with the fun and excitement of sliding around on RedClay courts and learning a lifestyle based on a traditional European social activity.

The British and Europeans, who of course gave us soccer, want American kids to join the tradition of playing in the "red dirt" - -  and without the contact-sport injuries!  We hit only tennis balls!  

Quote:

“TFI is pleased to partner and support RCUSA with their RedClay School Initiative in America.  All the Tennis Force partners in Europe wish great success for the school pilot projects.  

We hope it starts the trend of American families playing on RedClay their entire lives, just as it’s been in our culture for over 100 years.”  

 Alex Vuga, Managing Director, Tennis Force Intl. GmbH, Switzerland


Quote:  

Former ATP Pro Coach Peter Lundgren to RCUSA

“Americans are long overdue experiencing the health benefits and aesthetics of the red clay culture enjoyed in Europe. All the artistic play for which Roger (Federer) is known, plus the down-in-the-dirt excitement of today’s game.” 

Former Coach of Roger Federer, Marat Safin, Grigor Dimitrov, Marcelo Rios, Stan Wawrinka


                      Some Open Questions About American Tennis 
"USA tennis needs more clay, but how??   It's too expensive!", a standard quote from "every U.S. tennis instructor, fan and commentator" for the last 25 years!  
Why was the U.S. Open played on clay for three years in the '70's?
TF2 RedClay provides the answer:  "Clay without the cost, for anywhere!"

                                               
RCUSA hopes theTF2 RedClay court technology will be considered by the USTA as a potential new "10-and-under" component for next-generation USTA Youth Tennis programs.
RCUSA believes this exciting technology makes TF2 RedClay the most economical tennis court ever...therefore putting tennis within the reach of everyone in America.  


Since TF2 RedClay has virtually no maintenance and very little or no water usage, all for the same or lesser installation price of other traditional hard or clay surfaces, clay tennis can now be considered viable for public court use.

No longer should clay court tennis be called only a "country club" or "private club" sport.

And no longer just a school sport, because it's a great lifelong activity if played on clay. Just ask any European!

                                      


Be part of the leading voices for the RedClay School Initiative. 

          


HERE'S OUR FIRST PLANNED SCHOOL PROJECTS:


Pilot-project school site:  Brandywine Tennis, FL

Brandywine Tennis in DeLand, FL is converting their entire complex of green clay and hard courts to TF2 RedClay.  

The nation's first planned complete club retrofit from old green American clay and  hard courts to the new TF2 RedClay from Germany!

Brandywine projects they will save thousands of dollars per clay court per year in maintenance costs alone with the new TF2 RedClay courts.

Brandywine is working with St. Barnabas, Southwestern and DeLand Middle Schools.  St. Barnabas' School Principal, Paul Garcia states the RedClay School Initiative is, "...informative and motivating. I appreciate you including St. Barnabas in it and you have my support."

Brandywine is already working with local schools to accommodate foreign students who would live and practice at Brandywine while attending school.


A sample piece of a TF2 RedClay court is held here (above) by a Brandywine student to promote the club's conversion to TF2 RedClay.

 Ryan Bauman, Tennis Director and Operations Manager, Brandywine Tennis, DeLand, FL, discussing the idea of TF2 RedClay, kids and local schools:  above.

Above: Ryan discussing how TF2 court technology changes the tennis world in the USA. 

Above:  The Brandywine Clubhouse and hard courts scheduled for TF2 conversion.

The diagram below is the proposed Brandywine Tennis Club conversion plans:

“…this innovative new court technology makes TF2 RedClay a perfect fit for Florida schools and our club, and everywhere in the U.S.  The RedClay School Initiative can really introduce kids to this imported "sport", the best new alternative to traditional school contact sports!", Ryan Bauman, Operations Manager, Brandywine Tennis, DeLand Florida


Pilot-project school site: Boyne Mountain, Michigan 


The Rod Laver Tennis Camp was held at the Boyne Mountain Resort in Michigan during the 1970's. Today Boyne Mountain and Boyne Highlands hope to re-ignite the tennis passion of the 1970's through introduction of the new TF2 RedClay on which students can learn to love tennis.

Boyne Resorts is the second largest ski and golf resort operator in the USA.


Pilot Project school site:  Traverse City, Michigan 

Traverse City, Michigan's public school LEAP Tennis Coordinator (Learning, Enrichment and Athletics Program), Chris Michalowski, is working to integrate a school/club tennis program using the TF2 RedClay courts.

Chris states, 

“We're happy to be in the front of a cultural shift from hard courts to clay tennis and offer this new technology to change the ways schools can present tennis to their students.  

We’re glad to take a leadership role to import a re-engineered RedClay tennis court that’s proven successful in Europe.  I’m convinced it will help create a great new school tennis program and be a good lifestyle addition for students and their families.”

“Making the shift to TF2® RedClay tech courts will set a club apart from the rest as well as improve the longevity of members when it comes to playing this lifetime sport. TF2 RedClay will enable us to develop a more well rounded game in junior players, allowing them more opportunities to become successful using different styles and tactics.” 

Chris "Mick" Michalowski, Public School Tennis Coordinator, Traverse City Michigan


Pilot-Project school site:  Providence, Rhode Island

Larry Sack, Tennis Director, SPOT Program

SPOT (Serving Providence Organized Tennis) is working to bring RedClay tennis to several local schools in the area where Larry's efforts over the years have been awarded with the Top 50 Welcome Tennis Centers in the nation and New England Community Tennis Association of the year 2014 by the USTA.
“I look forward to being part of the inaugural RedClay Club and working with the RCUSA to promote their message of new RedClay tennis technology for our school systems. I believe RedClay tennis offers a great alternative to contact sports that children learn and play for a lifetime, especially now that innovation has eliminated the burdensome costs associated with clay,”  says Larry Sack.

----------------------------------

Comments from Teaching Pros and the Tennis Industry:

“This surface (Tennis Force®) was the preferred option of our coaching team due to the closeness to real (traditional red) clay, while retaining good drainage and easy maintenance...“…wish you (RCUSA) great success on bringing this new red clay surface to the U.S.” 

Daniel Gomm, Facilities Operations Manager, British LTA, National Tennis Centre, Roehampton, England

British Lawn Tennis Association, Training Center, with Tennis Force court technology since 2013.  (see above)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"Congratulations to the RedClayClub!

I'm happy to be part of this campaign and I think it's time for Asians to discover the great benefits of playing on Red Clay . With the help of playing on Red Clay I think we may see the very first born and raised Asian Men's Singles Grand Slam Champion ." 

Randy Villanueva, Vice President - Philippine Tennis Association, Asian Tennis Federation, Director 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"For us the new TF2 RedClay courts are better because we can use them under most conditions (dry quickly after rain,don’t need as much water when it is hot) and they play like traditional red clay courts. We have a couple of ATP pros training on them and they are very happy with the surface as well.

We are happy with the decision because we spend less time looking after courts and more time using them.” 

 Kevin Sorensen,Tennis Director, Top Tennis Club, Stuttgart, Germany

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TF2 RedClay courts offer America the perfect new alternative when resurfacing any aging hard or existing green clay court in America - - and TF2 ends up being far less expensive and better for your body in the long run.

               We invite you to talk to us about your tennis ideas and plans.

                                                 

                                 Every kid will want his own RedClay tennis court!

                                               


Can RedClay tennis can become as popular as football and soccer in the USA?  

Yes! 

America is now far more aware of the inherent problems of football and contact sports.

New TF2 RedClay court technology can be the literal game-changer for increasing the popularity of tennis in U.S. schools and clubs - - as a definitive new alternative to contact sports, (Purdue University research on concussions, August 2015)

The TF2 courts are the answer to the dangerous school contact sports, (LeBron  James, "No Football in My House", ESPN.com, Nov. 2014) we keep indoctrinating our youngest, year after year, without new options.



See perks for the RedClay Club logo racquet bag above:

RCC License Plate perk below:


Phase II of our RedClay School Initiative (2017):

How do we get LOTS of kids around the world interested in playing RedClay tennis?  

RCTV!

Contact us about Phase II development of the RCTV Broadcast Stadium Court.

The RCTV Stadium Court "Naming Rights" are available in the Perks section.
See two photos below:  the difference in visual impact between European RedClay and  traditional American clay. 



                                  
Thank you for helping support our RedClay School Initiative and introducing our RedClay tennis court innovation to the American sporting and lifestyle culture,
RCUSA LLC
Van Kalker Construction Inc.
Tennis Force Intl. GmbH
Sportas GmbH
Jil Gordon
Andrew Fitzpatrick
Naomi Broady
redclayclub.com
Brandywine Tennis & Fitness Club
Chris Michalowski
Larry Sack
Boyne Resorts
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Note:  Some images used in this presentation are believed to have been selected from those available for free online.  If not the case with a particular image, please contact us for clarifying usage.  Thank  you.
story_txt:
The RedClay Club announces new European RedClay court technology as the grass-roots foundation for a new safer school sport to offer our children. 
See our April 2016 national Press Release here announcing our School Initiative supported by this campaign, and the 5-Year plan to assimilate RedClay tennis into schools as a safer alternative to contact sports like football.
We want schools to teach children something they can play and enjoy for a lifetime.
Official RedClay Club sponsorships will help the RedClay School Initiative bring innovative, affordable European RedClay to American schools and start a whole new sporting culture in America.  Just like soccer from Europe did 30 years ago.


Nina's entire article on clay tennis, quoted above.Serena Williams, World #1, quoted in Paris at the French Open on traditional European red clay courts:  “I love the clay. I love to slide!”Serena and the new RedClay Club agree, so please join us to spread the word!A 2016 U.S. patent just announced by RCUSA makes the amazing TF2 RedClay court innovation from Germany marketable, affordable and practical... so kids can get out and "play in the dirt".   Here's How and Why it can Happen Now:From:  USTA 
To:  RedClay USA 
“I’m pleased to learn that you connected with  Scott Schultz [current USTA University Managing Director] on this initiative and I share his excitement about your plans to develop red clay courts in the U.S.”
Gordon SmithExecutive Director/COO, USTA"Thank you USTA!  We believe new German RedClay court technology and the new RedClay Club can help grow healthy lifestyles by rethinking American tennis with affordable, practical RedClay courts," --- 
The RedClay School Initiative Team This may be the national initiative that U.S. schools and the tennis world have been waiting for. Let's welcome our children to the next imported European classic...                                           The new RedClayClub.com, founded by RCUSA, is the proud voice of our exciting new national School Initiative! 

Contributors to this grassroots school campaign become lifetime RedClay Club members as they receive their perks.  See redclayclub.com for RedClay promotional items to wear.









The amazing TF2 RedClay court innovation finally knocks down the cost barriers of tennis for most Americans, reinforcing our effort to launch this cultural shift away from typical American hard courts for tennis.  


       

The RedClay School Initiative is centered around the newly patented European RedClay court technology, which breaks down the cost barrier for affordable clay tennis courts - - anywhere, even in U.S. climates where water must be conserved. RedClay tennis is a timely alternative and compliment to the more problematic contact sports one plays as a youth.  What Our Campaign Funds:  
It awards financial grants up to $25,000 to a limited number of schools and clubs to install their first TF2 courts used for their pilot-projects.  Our goal of $100,000 will help launch and operate our first pilot project sites listed here, and allow for additional first-come first-serve school sites through a successful on-going campaign.
What You Receive in Perks:
By contributing you can receive an early-bird court installation price.  Please contact us directly for details. Contributions and sponsorships can be tailored if you'd like to support your particular school or club choice by contacting us at: info@redclayusa.com.
Who We Are:
RCUSA LLC, and its RedClay Club and global partners, Tennis Force Intl. GmbH, and Sportas GmbH, are working to create TF2 RedClay court facilities around the world.  RCUSA is the exclusive USA distributor for Tennis Force products.             
What Is TF2 RedClay?We believe TF2 RedClay is the finest court innovation since clay tennis was invented.  TF2® RedClay, and is real terra cotta clay, just like that used in French Open courts, but now with dramatically improved functionality by mixing in proprietary polymers during a new installation process!  It's that simple.  It was awarded the most innovative tennis product in Germany for 2009 by German Tennis Magazine. It's real red clay without the prohibitive maintenance of a traditional clay tennis court, with 90% of those costs eliminated.  And the periodical resurfacing expense, associated with hard or traditional courts, is never needed with TF2.It's the easiest surface to learn and teach on.  Easiest on the body.  RedClay turns young students of the game into lifelong players - - constant players who love the exhilaration of sliding and competing, not just being fans.The German-engineered TF2 court technology means the USA no longer needs to "asphalt-over" the continuous acceptance of hard-court induced injuries. Please see more details and specifications about our new court technology at redclayusa.com and tennis-force.com.

story:
THANK YOU! We reached more than 675% of our initial funding goal !! Coming soon on Indiegogo Marketplace...

Keep updated on Marketplace availability.

 

THEY RECEIVED IT !

The first receptions have started and will continue in the coming days.

 

FIRSTS BACKERS FEEDBACKS 

Thank you for all your feedback! 

 

HOW MUCH DO YOU HATE YOUR ALARM CLOCK?

Guillaume, the inventor of Sensorwake Trio, used to hate mornings. And he soon realized that he was not alone.

According to a survey of 2,000 people by SleepJunkie, more than 80% of people feel dreadful or anxious when their alarm goes off in the morning.

Have you ever felt this way ? There is no reason to brand yourself « not a morning person ». You are simply using the wrong alarm clock.
 

IMAGINE GENTLY WAKING UP TO YOUR FAVORITE SMELLS, EVERY DAY!


 

What if you could wake up happier, more motivated, and ready to take on each day? With Sensorwake Trio, you choose from a wide variety of smells, like coffee, the beach, forest, or peppermint. Change them out as often as you change your mind. Stop hating your alarm clock. Start making your mornings better.

We're proud to introduce Sensorwake Trio - our latest innovation after three years of research and development. 
 

 TECH SPECS 
 

 

OUR TEAM HAS GROWN, TOO  

From a garage to nearly a dozen people. We're incredibly thankful for how far we've come. 
 

WITH THANKS TO:

  • Google - Incubator & Accelerator
  • Givaudan - Scents Mixing & Creation
  • Lexibook - Industrial Manufacturer
  • BNP Parabas WAI Boost - Accelerator
  • Zagatub - Accelerator
  • Backerkit - Customer Service & Fulfillment
story_txt:
THANK YOU! We reached more than 675% of our initial funding goal !! Coming soon on Indiegogo Marketplace...Keep updated on Marketplace availability. THEY RECEIVED IT ! The first receptions have started and will continue in the coming days. FIRSTS BACKERS FEEDBACKS Thank you for all your feedback!  HOW MUCH DO YOU HATE YOUR ALARM CLOCK?Guillaume, the inventor of Sensorwake Trio, used to hate mornings. And he soon realized that he was not alone.According to a survey of 2,000 people by SleepJunkie, more than 80% of people feel dreadful or anxious when their alarm goes off in the morning.Have you ever felt this way ? There is no reason to brand yourself « not a morning person ». You are simply using the wrong alarm clock. IMAGINE GENTLY WAKING UP TO YOUR FAVORITE SMELLS, EVERY DAY!

 What if you could wake up happier, more motivated, and ready to take on each day? With Sensorwake Trio, you choose from a wide variety of smells, like coffee, the beach, forest, or peppermint. Change them out as often as you change your mind. Stop hating your alarm clock. Start making your mornings better.We're proud to introduce Sensorwake Trio - our latest innovation after three years of research and development.  WAKE UP REFRESHED AND ON TIME!
Sensorwake Trio fully wakes you up in three minutes. It starts with your favourite smells followed by a soothing light and a motivating melody.
It's a simple concept. Let's activate all of your senses to wake you up more fully. Featuring safe, clean-air dry diffusion technology to leave you waking up refreshed.

 
TESTED AND APPROVED BY +1,000 HOTEL CLIENTS WORLDWIDE
Before launching our crowdfunding campaign, we had to make sure Sensorwake Trio was really efficient at waking you up in a more gentle way. That’s why we partnered with one of the world’s largest hotel group to have hotel guests experienced our new way to wake up.

The results confirmed our intuition and even went beyond our expectations. 94% of people surveyed declared that Sensorwake Trio made a very positive difference in the way they woke up. That’s when we knew we were really onto something ! 

100% of Sensorwake Trio users wake-up within a three-minute time. Even heavy sleepers catched their flight on time.
 
NAMED ONE OF GOOGLE'S TOP 15 INVENTIONS THAT CAN CHANGE THE WORLD
This unique concept for a smell-based alarm clock is completely different from everything on the market. We're honored to be among the world's top innovators in hardware. 

 
PRESS REVIEWS
----------> They tested it for you <-----------


 
PARTNERED WITH GIVAUDAN FOR WORLD CLASS SCENTS   
All fragrances are designed in France by Givaudan, our partner and the world leader in fragrance creation. You can easily get new capsules on our website after the campaign. 
 
 
 


SENSORWAKE TRIO IS VERY EASY TO USE

With 3 easy steps, the product is simple to set up and intuitive to use. 
 




WE ARE READY TO DELIVER IN NOVEMBER
Our designs have been tested and proven.  The electronics components are ready and the moulds have been made so we are all set up to manufacture. 



THE MAKING OF SENSORWAKE TRIO 
Our designs have been tested and proven. We have been working on perfecting the technology to get it ready to bring home. 
We're passionate about bringing in natural elements into your home, which means choosing from among dozens of possible wood accents.  

 
CAREFULLY CRAFTED FROM THE INSIDE OUT 
Our mighty small device packs a big punch. This striking design makes a sophisticated statement in any home.


A SILENT AND OIL FREE DIFFUSION TECHNOLOGY 

 TECH SPECS   OUR TEAM HAS GROWN, TOO  From a garage to nearly a dozen people. We're incredibly thankful for how far we've come.  
  
NOT SURE YET? LET GUILLAUME TELL YOU MORE ABOUT SENSORWAKE TRIO
 

 WITH THANKS TO:
Google - Incubator & Accelerator
Givaudan - Scents Mixing & Creation
Lexibook - Industrial Manufacturer
BNP Parabas WAI Boost - Accelerator
Zagatub - Accelerator
Backerkit - Customer Service & Fulfillment

story:
Boxing By Syd has been serving our community for the past 7 years, and now as the SydFit Health Centre we will be able to serve the total needs of our community under one roof. A SydFIT members remarks, " at age 40, I'm happier than I ever was in my 30's!  The trainers see each person's individuality and tailor the training accordingly."          - Robert Reeves 

SydFIT Team

This expansion is very exciting because of the depth of service we will be able to provide to individuals, athletes, teams and families. Our youth boxing programs are full, and we don't want to start a waiting list, so it's time to expand and increase our boxing area and programs!   The SydFIT  Health Centre has a zero tolerance for bullying of all ages, and our Youth Mentors that teach our young boxers promote leadership skills, and help our youth build self confidence, and community pride. 

Youth programs that teach and mentor young adults.

Part of the new services that we are offering to our members, is the expert strength and conditioning training that our pro athletes utilize in their training programs.  By having these amazing coaches included in our team or trainers, we will give our members the most well rounded and elite services possible.

Craig Bongelli - Strength Conditioning Coach at Lil's Gym


"Dangerous" Denton Daley Professional Boxer ranked #7 in world - "I train here because to be the best, you need to surround yourself with the best."

- Denton Daley




Namah Daghir Professional Boxer 

Christopher Windover Sports Strength & Performance Coach 

Our athletes and members spent more time last year using our massage and nutrition services than ever before. To accommodate this growth we are adding more onsite health & wellness professionals. With the addition of the Wellness Centre, our members, athletes and teams will be able to take advantage of even more essential health and wellness services all from one location and a connected team of professionals.

Julie Stark Registered Massage Therapist with 10+ years of experience

 Our personal training services are getting amazing results for our members, and we are looking to support more members of our community with their healthy lifestyle changes. To give our trainers all of the resources they need, we are adding 50% more space and new equipment to allow them to create dynamic and functional programs for our personal training members.


Dr. Laura Stix Naturopathic Doctor & Clinical Hypnotherapist

Dr. Stix holds a diploma from the Boucher Institute of Naturopathic Medicine in British Columbia. Prior to this she earned an Honours Degree in Science from the University of Waterloo, Ontario, graduating magna cum laude with a Major in Psychology and a Minor in Biology. Always intrigued by the field of neuroscience, she was awarded a research grant from the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (NSERC) and additionally completed an honours thesis in the field of brain research.Recognizing the importance of mind-body medicine in achieving optimal health, Dr. Stix obtained additional training at The Pacific Institute of Advanced Hypnotherapy in British Columbia, and is a Certified Clinical Hypnotherapist with the International Medical and Dental Hypnotherapy Association.


Erika Gmeindl Certified Personal Trainer and Fitness Instructor - "Erika challenges you each workout and keeps you interested by always mixing up your routines. She is a significant key player to my 30 pound weight loss."- Lesley Ordiway

Our members are challenging themselves with many different adventures, including the annual Bad Ass Dash, Warrior Dash, and Tuff Mudder adventure races. Training to a level they never thought they could achieve, conquering fears and establishing new goals as individuals and as a team.  Members also participate in many charity events, such as the annual Run for the Cure in support of Cancer research.

SydFIT Adventure Race Team

"This is by far the best training I have ever done, and at 50 the fittest I have ever been in my life." - Jill Doupe


Brand new to the SydFIT experience, will be our Yoga programs, instructed by certified instructor Julie Stevenson, and 10 year veteran Brad Seftel.  One of the top requests by our members was to incorporate yoga into our fitness programs, and now we will have a 1300 square foot studio to fulfill this request.

SydFIT Yoga

As our community continues to grow, so must the amenities within our facility.  Two brand new change rooms with more showers and change area will be added to the space, including a brand new sauna to help work out those post work out aches!!!

The SydFIT Wellness Centre is excited to continue to educate, motivate and facilitate healthy bodies and minds in our community for many years to come!

story:
Our Delicious Japanese Green Tea 

The verdant slopes of Mt Fuji have long been renowned for producing some of the highest quality green teas in the world.  We have combined these teas grown on traditional family farms with superb natural flavoring and are looking to release a new line of teas in easy-to-brew single serving tea bags, packaged in a beautiful packs with a retro Japanese antique style label.

Great served Hot or Iced.  Naturally sweet but great with a little honey.

________Our 5 Gentle Flavors______________________________________

  • 桜                 Sakura-cherry blossom
  • 柚子             Yuzu-citrus
  • バニラ           Vanilla
  • ベリー           Berry
  • パイナップル Pineapple


   

Who We Are

Our team of farmers and foodies have been farming on the slopes of Mt Fuji for years. We are always looking for ways to support agriculture and bring more amazing Japanese foods to the world.  The Mt Fuji Green Teas are our newest product and we are sure you will love them.


What We Need & What You Get

Our blends have been taste tested to perfection and now it is time to package and send them out.   This campaign is a way for us to share the first run with you and we are hoping to build a team of fans and supporters who will fall in love with our amazing flavors.

Your orders and support will help us launch this great new product.  Enjoy the tea at home or come visit us at the Solar Cafe in Yamanashi and enjoy your tea with a fresh garden pizza while experiencing our amazing Mt Fuji views!

Visit Our Farm

 In 2000, the Earth Embassy eco-design group founded the Solar Cafe & Organic Farm to develop local recipes and create a space for visitors to learn about Japanese sustainable farming.     Read more at www.earthembassy.org.   


Join Us For Lunch

 Our little restaurant and guest house are open from April to October, serving guests from around the world who come to enjoy our local recipes, wild mountain vegetables and experience the amazing nature of the Mt Fuji 5 Lakes region.       
Read more at  Solar Cafe & Farm  


Stay with Us 

Our guest house is available for families visiting Japan, farm tours, events and weddings.  Details & reservations here... https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/6879294

story:
What is Toxxscan?

Toxxscan takes the ”chemical guessing” out of your shopping. It's a database with a service that color codes product data so you can check out chemicals, and ultimately barcodes and be able to avoid chemical health risks in production or when you shop.

Imagine if children could grow up without being a receptacle for the thousands of small chemical substances that are in our environment today. That they could avoid being exposed to chemicals that disrupt their hormones (EDC's) and others that cause weight gain and health problems like cancer.
That they could be free to be children.

It's time to say NO to exposure to chemical health risks. We need practical tools that help us steer clear of the risks. That's why we created Toxxscan – the easy way to find the safest products. 

Toxxscan's service is based on a database.
The database will contain product ingredients, bar codes and chemicals linked to world research on health risks. Building a database like this costs money. We have the strategy, method and algorithms ready to go.

Consumers can check the chemical hazards on the internet and get easy to read, color-coded information that helps you protect yourself and those you love.

Producers of goods, apps, websites get access to unique software with a license to access Toxxscans information and review product ingredients en masse. This reduces use of chemicals with known health risks in production or sales.

You shouldn’t have to be a scientist in order to decipher a label.

Toxxscan started out just like anything else. We had a problem and that problem needed to be solved. In this case it started with chemicals that have a negative influence on our health and lives. For instance phthalates – endocrine disrupting chemicals or EDCs that can be found in most perfumed goods, your evening meal that has been microwaved in plastic or sunscreens that cover your body. By disrupting the endocrine system, these chemicals can be related to numerous health problems affecting reproduction, endocrine-related cancers, obesity and diabetes.  

 

The scary part is that phthalates are only one example among hundreds and hundreds of chemical compounds that can pose a risk to your health.

Freedom of choice is a birth-right but when it comes to the complex labelling of chemical ingredients its hard to exercise that freedom.  It’s high time to ask ourselves why these dangerous chemicals continue to be used and why it’s so difficult to discover and avoid them?  

To contributions

If all you want to know is if a product is safe or not – that's easy. 

The Toxxscan database and service provide these answers by linking to international chemical ingredient data from well known universities and research institutes around the globe.

As a consumer you access the Toxxscan database online. Just write in a chemical ingredient and you have easy access to known chemical health risks. 

Once the database is complete we want to make an app. If you want to scan a barcode and get the ingredients in an app or scanner, your food chain or producer needs to allow access to product barcodes and ingredients. An app or scanner can then dispaly thumbs up or a questionmark depending on the results from the database algorithm. Toxxscan makes ingredients easier to read and health risks understandable.

As a food store owener who takes pride in your range of products, wouldn't you also like to check out possible chemical health risks before taking in new products? You can use the Toxxscan software to check barcodes if all the ingredients are digitally connected to the barcode. This also enables natural advertising of your products giving you a unique edge in the marketplace because your store invites your customers to get full ingredient transparency.

As a producer who needs to know about product safety – we've got your back! Toxxscan's database and software let you run a product ingredient check right in your office – linking you straight to international research.  You can even check your packing ingredients – a common source of EDCs. The software makes it easy to understand and if needed, helps you to find alternative ingredients or packaging. And when you upload your products on the database, Toxxscan gives your company a unique transparency-edge on your competitors.

As a purchaser of food and other articles for preschools, the elderly and healthcare industry, we have the tool that ensures chemical safety in everything you buy. Just run your orders through Toxxscan and find out which products are risk-free. Couldn’t be more simple!

But there is a catch.

The service needed for this product to hit the market is dependant on a huge open source database. 


This is where we need your help.

We need to make the data available for everyone. To do this we need to complete the database. We have a top notch technical team ready to start work. So once we have all gathered the €50 000 needed for this job it should take about 6 months to complete and test.

This is not a lot of money considering what is involved. So we are reaching out to you, the world wide web, to join forces with us. We need to become an unstoppable force, a rolling thunder, a powerful voice that reaches everyone, everywhere. 

And we say everyone,because everyone has the right to know.

Chemical ingredients should not be something that can be hidden, and certainly not something you as a consumer or company should be unable to access. 
Please help us fund the tool that we all need.

So what do you want? Thumbs up? Or thumbs down?

To contributions

Thanks to our research and development team the database design is solid. It is designed by Dr Robert Verkerk, from the Alliance for Natural Health International, Dr Fiorella Belpoggi and Dr Daniele Mandrioli, from the Ramazzini Institute, Italy and produced by EnvirohealthMatters and the Toxxscan team as an incubator start-up at UIC, Uppsala Innovation Centre.

To contributions

story:
Thank you so much to everyone who has helped Purple get our running start! We are amazed and astounded at the support we've received from our early adopters :D We are discontinuing our InDemand as we are now fully launched on our own website. Sweet Dreams!


So what's in it for me?

What IS Purple, Anyway?

Purple™ is a Hyper-Elastic™ polymer, which is super stretchy and super strong. That means it’s durable and your mattress won’t develop a body impression. It is also temperature neutral, hypoallergenic, responsive, and comfortable!

How Does Purple Work?

Purple™ is designed to give in under pressure-sensitive areas, like your hips and shoulders, and remain firm under the broader areas that need support like your back and legs - no matter where you are on the mattress. And those same hollow columns that make that possible naturally create airflow, allowing you to sleep on a temperature-neutral, breathable sleep surface.



Purple™ is responsive enough for quality time with your partner, but won't jostle you around when they stir in the night. One more way the Purple™ bed is a no-compromise mattress.

Who Needs Purple™?

Everyone. 

Seriously… everyone. And that means you.

Sleep is vitally important to mental and physical health. Maximizing the quality of sleep without a reliance on chemical sleep aids should be a priority for everyone. Purple provides the best pressure relief and back support on the market - two of the most important elements to a healthy sleep cycle. Good sleep means better health and alertness. And that probably means you’ll be better at your job and make more money. And that’s attractive!

What is the Purple™ Bed?


The Purple™ Bed is soft where you want it and firm where you need it, providing you with optimal body alignment and comfort. Mattresses may take 2-3 weeks to ship after your order while we get everything finalized.

Purple™ vs Other Mattress Fillings

What is the Purple™ Top?

The Purple™ Top improves your existing mattress. But let’s get reasonable, if you have a quality mattress that is just too firm, this is a good option! But if you have a soft pillow top mattress or if your mattress has a big sag in it, the Purple™ Top won’t fix the problem! The Purple™ Top improves good-but-firm mattresses -- it is not a band-aid for broken down mattresses. Toppers are scheduled to begin shipping January 2016.


We sent Purple™ Top Prototypes to a handful of people who had never experienced the technology; Here's what they had to say!

What is the Royal Purple™ Seat Cushion? 

Sit on your butt all day? The 2-inch Royal Purple™ Cushion is the most popular choice for office drones heroes, long-haul drivers, authors, artists, CEO’s, and anyone who spends a good chunk of the day working on their derriere. The Royal includes a washable cover with a convenient handle so you can show your Royal Purple™ off to your co-workers and make them super jealous...until, of course they get a Purple™ too. Then you can start a new office club!

We've sent the Royal to a handful of popular bloggers to have them try the raw egg test on Purple™! Click through to see their egg videos (we'll keep adding more as they pop up):

Simply Real Moms
Alida The Realistic Mama
My Crazy Good Life
Old House to New Home
The Thrifty Couple
Stockpiling Moms
Spaceships and Laser Beams

And don't forget to check out their blogs! They're pretty great :)

What is the Everywhere Purple™ Seat Cushion? 

You’re a busy person, running from home, to work, taking the kids to their various extracurricular endeavors, screaming your head off at the big game, hopping on a plane for business trips or vacations. Take the Everywhere Purple™ Cushion, well...everywhere. With 1.4 inches of cushion, convenient carrying handles, a washable cover,  and its compact folding design, you can take your Purple™ everywhere your butt sits.


What is the Purple Stress Reliever?

Okay, in all reality, it's a simple 3" x 3" Sample of Purple™. But it is honestly one of the coolest samples you may ever receive; you can use it as a stress reliever or a pen holder, or pop it in the fridge for a bit and use it as a teething toy for your munchkin. Now, we don't condone violence, but you can also shoot them across the room...that's why we're giving you two -- because it pays to be prepared!

How Did Purple™ Come About?

1989 found two brothers, engineers Tony and Terry Pearce, fly fishing in the Rockies and talking about partnering to change the world. Tony’s 13 years of experience in advanced aerospace materials, and Terry’s 20 years of experience in manufacturing, design, and project management, led to a partnership creating high-tech carbon fiber sporting goods and wheelchairs.

By 1993, wheelchair users that were testing the Pearce’s wheelchairs let them know that the real need was in better wheelchair cushioning. Pressure sores were a really bad part of their lives. Taking that challenge, the Pearces created Floam™, the world’s lightest-weight cushioning fluid. Soon, Floam™ had five patents and was being used in not only wheelchair cushions, but also by major licensees of the Pearces in critical-care medical beds (Hill-Rom), footwear (Nike), ankle/knee braces (Johnson & Johnson), golf bag straps (Top-Flite), neonatal intensive care (preemie baby) ‘nests’, surgical positioning cushions, surgical tourniquet cushions, ballet cushions, industrial knee pads, and more.

Now known for the world’s most advanced cushioning products, the Pearces set out to create a technology that could revolutionize cushioning at a much lower cost than Floam™. Purple™ began to evolve through a series of discoveries and product developments. The first breakthrough came in the 1990s, when the Pearces invented hyper-elastic polymer. This amazingly soft, strong material could stretch 15 times its resting size, was uber-durable, and never took a body impression. The key discovery came when hyper-elastic polymer was molded in a shape that could “release” under pressure hot spots, redistributing the pressure to other areas. The same feature turned out to give amazing back support in mattresses. As time went on, the predecessor-products of Purple™ came to be licensed to makers of critical care medical beds (Stryker Medical); consumer mattresses in Europe (Swan by Ekornes), Japan (Francebed), and Australia (Sleepmaker); backpack straps (Jansport); shoe insoles (Dr. Scholl’s Massaging Gel and Sof-Sole); pillows (Sleep Innovations); soft-catch toy balls (Nickelodeon); seat cushions (WonderGel); wheelchair cushions (EquaPressure); and many other advanced cushioning products. In all, the Pearces have over 30 cushioning patents, and are known the world over as the premier source for superior cushioning technology.

Three years ago, the Pearces set out to combine all their knowledge of cushioning into the world’s best mattress. Hyper-elastomeric polymer had never been able to be molded into pieces as large as king-size mattresses. Even with only partial surface coverage, the mattresses made in Australia and Europe were too expensive to have hope of millions of people getting more comfortable. To make great mattresses, the whole surface needed to be hyper-elastic polymer, and the mattresses needed to be produced at high rates with low labor input. A patent-pending machine called Mattress Max was created, taking over two years and several million dollars. Now, Purple™ for mattresses is made in the USA by Mattress Max in single pieces large enough to fully cover a king-size mattress, and at production rates/costs that will help millions of people change their lives. Better than any $4000 mattress for about $1000 – that was the goal, and Purple™ achieved it.

Why Purple™? Well, why not? It is an awesome color, and it signifies treating everyone like royalty. The Pearces have spent most of their high-tech careers advancing the world of cushioning. With Purple™, they know they have put all they’ve learned into the world’s greatest bed, and they’ve figured out how to do it so everyone can afford it.

Where Are We in the Launch Effort?

After a successful funding on Kickstarter, we're already manufacturing and shipping product and are continually striving to perfect our operations. We're already looking to expand our space and we're adding to Team Purple regularly! Right now we're revving up to launch a major marketing campaign that will keep the momentum going that we've already gained from Kickstarter. Your contributions will help keep things running smoothly as we get sea legs.

We have successfully launched Purple and are in full production of mattresses and cushions, so you don't need to worry about whether or not you're going to get your product. Seat cushions will ship out right away, and the mattresses will ship within a few business days of your order. Toppers are scheduled to begin shipping in January of 2016.

The challenge of shipping is solved, we've partnered with UPS to ship the cushions, the mattress, and the topper directly to you. 


A Lot of People have asked if the egg in our video is real...and the answer is yes! Check out what happens to an egg on Purple™ vs High Quality Foam:
This is actually the very same foam that we use in the Purple™ Bed under the Purple. It's fantastic high quality, and relatively comfortable foam, but look at what a difference the Purple makes!
story_txt:
Thank you so much to everyone who has helped Purple get our running start! We are amazed and astounded at the support we've received from our early adopters :D We are discontinuing our InDemand as we are now fully launched on our own website. Sweet Dreams!So what's in it for me?

What IS Purple, Anyway?
Purple™ is a Hyper-Elastic™ polymer, which is super stretchy and super strong. That means it’s durable and your mattress won’t develop a body impression. It is also temperature neutral, hypoallergenic, responsive, and comfortable!

How Does Purple Work?
Purple™ is designed to give in under pressure-sensitive areas, like your hips and shoulders, and remain firm under the broader areas that need support like your back and legs - no matter where you are on the mattress. And those same hollow columns that make that possible naturally create airflow, allowing you to sleep on a temperature-neutral, breathable sleep surface.


Purple™ is responsive enough for quality time with your partner, but won't jostle you around when they stir in the night. One more way the Purple™ bed is a no-compromise mattress.


Who Needs Purple™?
Everyone. 
Seriously… everyone. And that means you.
Sleep is vitally important to mental and physical health. Maximizing the quality of sleep without a reliance on chemical sleep aids should be a priority for everyone. Purple provides the best pressure relief and back support on the market - two of the most important elements to a healthy sleep cycle. Good sleep means better health and alertness. And that probably means you’ll be better at your job and make more money. And that’s attractive!

What is the Purple™ Bed?






The Purple™ Bed is soft where you want it and firm where you need it, providing you with optimal body alignment and comfort. Mattresses may take 2-3 weeks to ship after your order while we get everything finalized.
Purple™ vs Other Mattress Fillings


What is the Purple™ Top?
The Purple™ Top improves your existing mattress. But let’s get reasonable, if you have a quality mattress that is just too firm, this is a good option! But if you have a soft pillow top mattress or if your mattress has a big sag in it, the Purple™ Top won’t fix the problem! The Purple™ Top improves good-but-firm mattresses -- it is not a band-aid for broken down mattresses. Toppers are scheduled to begin shipping January 2016.



We sent Purple™ Top Prototypes to a handful of people who had never experienced the technology; Here's what they had to say!

What is the Royal Purple™ Seat Cushion? 
Sit on your butt all day? The 2-inch Royal Purple™ Cushion is the most popular choice for office drones heroes, long-haul drivers, authors, artists, CEO’s, and anyone who spends a good chunk of the day working on their derriere. The Royal includes a washable cover with a convenient handle so you can show your Royal Purple™ off to your co-workers and make them super jealous...until, of course they get a Purple™ too. Then you can start a new office club!

And don't forget to check out their blogs! They're pretty great :)

But it is honestly one of the coolest samples you may ever receive; you can use it as a stress reliever or a pen holder, or pop it in the fridge for a bit and use it as a teething toy for your munchkin. story:
Short Summary

vaidyagrama healing community is an idea borne of the desire to "Live Simple Live Well Live Healthy Live Happy". The community is being created around the vaidyagrama Ayurveda healing village located in the midst of farmland outside Coimbatore.

The community has been conceived by a group of Ayurveda physicians and patients and well wishers who are passionate about living in tune with nature, being aligned with nature. This group has created the healing village where patients with different health issues from all over the world come for treatment through Ayurveda.

The healing community is an natural extension of the healing village; many patients and others desire to continue to live in the vicinity of the village so as to get -

  • a healing environment
  • good Ayurveda treatment
  • natural food
  • an Ayurveda way of life
  • and most importantly, to give back to the environment
The idea is to recycle, reuse, restore and recreate a community living in harmony with the surrounding environment. It is a holistic and comprehensive approach to creating a healing model that can be easily replicated in other parts of India.
This community incorporates 15 villages and a population of around 13000 people, of which around 10% are below the age of 6. Providing health, education, sanitation and meaningful and sustainable work is an important part of the objectives of the vaidyagrama healing community.

What We Need & What You Get

We need 100000 people to contribute USD 100 each. This amount goes to -

  • secure the land for the community; all land in this project will belong to the community and will not be owned by any particular individual
  • ensure that 70% of the land comes under agro-forestry the natural way
  • build homes and other public infrastructure on the remaining 30% of the land
  • introduce small cottage industries like beekeeping, animal husbandry, weaving, bamboo products, banana pulp products all of which can be done at the individual homes level
  • build a "how to live" school
  • create infrastructure for providing medical care effectively using nature's resources
  • inculcate the "principles of natural living" in the community so as to "live simple live well live healthy live happy

The Impact

Thus the Global Community Supports the Local Community to Support the Global Community

A model community that stays aligned with nature; lives in tune with nature; and can be replicated in other parts of India and abroad

Risks & Challenges

The challenges in this project include -

  • creating infrastructure is easy; "human change" is far more difficult.
  • moving the entire community from "money focus" to "happiness focus"
  • moving the entire community into "self sustainability" and "living off the land"
  • restoring the faith of the community in "natural farming"
  • restoring the faith of the community in the use of herbs to take care of health
  • restoring the faith of the community in their own culture, systems and practices
Patience, persistence and prayer is the way forward; working with each member of the community and building trust and faith in them in their own abilities is what we have already been doing over the past 5 years; and we will continue to do that and thereabout create the change required for building the above community


Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the message; get 10 of your friends to contribute to this cause; and request each of them to bring 10 of their friends to support this cause

That is all it takes to create the resources required to achieve this goal of "Live Simple Live Well Live Healthy Live Happy"

story:
I am confident there are some people out there who believe in holistic, complementary care, and the impact a healthy lifestyle and diet can have on one’s health.  If you’re out there, would you please help me by contributing to my campaign to get to Paracelsus?  I am willing to commit to doing my part--changing my diet, reducing stress, meditating more, practicing yoga, etc., in order to recover my health. 

Here's my story:

I have been self-employed as a massage therapist for almost 20 years. I am single and live with my canine companion, who is an angel disguised as the cutest mutt ever! Although I believe allopathic medicine is very useful for some things, I am a huge proponent of alternative and complementary healthcare, and focus my energy on living a simple, healthy lifestyle. I believe the environment, what I put into and onto my body, and how I manage my mind has a huge impact on my health.

 

Two years ago, I developed large uterine fibroids.  I had severe abdominal and low back pain and became unable to poop, had to pee all the time, my legs got numb, virtually anything I ate made me sick, I couldn’t sleep and had severe mood swings.  Being in a relationship was completely out of the question!  The doctors said a hysterectomy would solve all these problems (except finding a relationship partner!!). Being self-employed it is extremely difficult to get affordable health insurance.  But I decided to find health insurance, whatever the cost, so I could get that surgery and feel like a normal human being again.  After the surgery, I planned to let the insurance go, since I knew I couldn’t afford to keep it, and, anyway, I prefer alternative care for most things, which insurance doesn’t cover.

 

So, I had the surgery 8 months ago.  While I was insured, I decided to get some routine testing done, like a mammogram, bone density scan, etc.  Much to my horror they discovered that not only do I have osteoporosis (I’m only 50!), but also I was diagnosed with breast cancer.  I kept the insurance, moved to a cheaper apartment, and had bilateral lumpectomies.  Of course, being a massage therapist, having these surgeries meant I couldn’t work.  I got extremely lucky and found administrative work at a spa—it pays ¼ of what I could make doing massage, but, hey, it’s a job, and I’m grateful!  I waited patiently for my body to heal from the surgeries and the symptoms to go away.  All the while bills were accumulating from the insurance deductible and the portion of the medical bills that insurance didn’t cover, bills that I don’t have money to pay.  I’m determined not to have to file for bankruptcy, and equally determined to stay positive, not stress, and focus on getting better so I can contribute to society by doing work that I love and that supports me.

 

That hasn’t happened.  I still have severe abdominal pain, can eat only a few foods without getting sick, can’t sleep, and have fallen into a severe depression.  Further testing has shown large liver cysts, a soft tissue tumor of unknown origin in my abdomen, severe heavy metal poisoning, inflammation around my heart and malnourishment since my body isn’t digesting food properly.  I’m exhausted from going from doctor to doctor and finding no definitive diagnosis, and from trying treatment after treatment that hasn’t worked.

 

I am desperate to find a practitioner who can see the whole picture, a Dr. House-type diagnostician, so I can begin the project of healing and getting my life back. 

 

In my search for a real Dr. House, I discovered Biological Medicine and the work of Thomas Rau, MD, who runs Paracelsus Clinic in Switzerland.  www.paracelsus.ch.  Immediately, I resonated with the work he’s doing and felt hope for the first time in years that I might actually be able to identify what's unbalanced, get treatment, feel well and change my life.  But Paracelsus is not covered by US insurance (although most European insurances do cover treatment there, I've been told).  The cost is moderate by US standards, but not if I must pay the entirety out-of-pocket.

 

I discovered a foundation in the States that partially supports in-need patients who are committed to the Biological Medicine approach to receive treatment at Paracelsus.  I applied for help and have been offered $5,000, which is enough to cover one week of treatment there.  This feels like an incredible opportunity for me to learn to take responsibility for my health and to heal.  However, I can only accept this money if I can raise the same amount of money to cover the second week of the required two-week stay. I must also raise money to cover accommodation ($1,400) and airfare to Switzerland ($1,200) and remedies and infusions to bring home with me ($1-2,000).  (EXCITING UPDATE:  on 8/11 I was gifted enough frequent flyer miles to get a roundtrip ticket to Switzerland!!!  I truly believe that anything is possible now!)  

 

I don’t want to live out my life barely able to make it through the day, making my dog turn back for home after only walking for a few minutes, wondering what’s wrong with me and wanting to die.  Nor do I want to face further surgeries, radiation and chemo, treatments that I don't believe in and may well jeopardize my quality of life just because that is what my insurance will agree to cover.

 

My goal is to reach a place where I’m well enough to use my experiences and healing gifts to give back to those in need, and well enough to give my canine angel the "mom" he deserves!

 

I am so grateful to you for reading my story and contributing anything you are able.  Any money I receive in excess of my goal, I will contribute to Santa Fe Small Dog Rescue, in honor of my canine companion, who has given me a reason to keep going, makes me laugh and has taught me so much about unconditional love! 

 

Blessings,

Julia
